review_text: I'd highly recommend staying here! Beautiful location on the river and close to bike trails. The place was clean and spacious, and I loved the pool/ping-pong/air hockey table. It gave us something to do when the weather didn't cooperate with our plans! Tracie was very responsive and accommodating. I'd definitely stay here again if in the area!
Once again, another great stay at Tracie’s place. We cannot wait to go again!

We usually come to the area for a weekend in the summer and decided to stay here this year. We arrived on a hot day and it was very hot in the house. We quickly turned on the 2 window units, but they were not enough to cool the whole house. One of the bedrooms stayed very hot and uncomfortable. There are several fans around also. One bedroom has a window unit and the other one is in the living area. The second bedroom really needs a window unit or portable air conditioner.
Other than the heat, the house was as described. It has an interesting layout. My kids enjoyed the games and the game table. The kitchen is well stocked. The outdoor area is wonderful. We enjoyed overlooking the river and the fire pit was nice. I wish we would have had more time to use the kayaks, that would have been fun. The dock is nice also. There was plenty of room for 6 of us to sleep comfortably. Overall it was a nice place to stay.

We enjoyed our short stay here, especially using the pool table and kayaks (including a two person one). The river depth around this area is quite shallow, some spots under a foot deep, and it was possible to also fairly easily to go “upstream” since not much current. Enjoyed sitting on the deck and enjoying the nature, including watching a heron. The cottage has quite a bit of room and we encourage others to consider staying there as well.
Great place to stay. Will stay there again.
My boyfriend and I had a great time staying at the cottage. It was very relaxing.

This place was beautiful, spacious and very relaxing for our girls weekend . The area has a lot of fun things to do and great restaurants.
Would recommend this to anyone looking for a relaxing weekend by the water
Everything about this experience was exceptional. Tracie was responsive and professional. The cottage was homey and peaceful. The surroundings are beautiful. We’ll be back.

This was all we imagined and more. The peace and tranquility of this space is amazing. The space was extremely tidy and there was an abundance of amenities. I have read the reviews of others and thought this place seems great. To be honest it exceeded all our expectations and words can not describe how happy we were with our stay! Tracie has been the best host! If we are back in the area again we will definitely want to stay here! We highly recommend you book here before everyone finds out how great it truely is and there are no more vacancies!!

Tracies place was perfect for what we needed! Short distance from Ferris State University, peaceful waterfront property, well stocked kitchen, comfortable beds and ample towels and paper products. Wish we had more time to use the outdoor toys. Maybe next time. Will definitely be back!

Beautiful views of the large Muskegon river. Went in the fall and enjoyed the gorgeous bright red trees on the property as well as the fire pit. Comfortable beds and family-friendly board games from the cabinet made it a perfect getaway.
So many little extras to complete the stay. Beautiful place, peaceful and quiet. Just as described.

We had a very comfortable stay at this spacious cottage. The host provided great instructions/communication. We enjoyed the wildlife on the water, grilling out, and the fire pit. Would book again in the future. Very convenient to Big Rapids amenities.
We loved our stay at this cute house on the river, the views were spectacular and no end of options of things to do either inside or out on the water.
Beautiful place to stay with great views of the river. Some caught some nice sized perch off the dock. Lots of fish biting. Comfortable bedrooms and large living room. We did enjoy the pool table.

This place is everything!!!!! Beautiful view, quiet, peaceful, entertaining and just adorable. It has super comfortable details with an at home vibe. It had all the basics we needed plus some! The kayaks, and boats and life vests were a bonus as well. The host was super responsive and warm. We cannot wait to book again.

We had such a nice stay at the Sleepy Willow Cottage. The cottage was spacious and nice. Had everything we needed and more inside. There were tons of things to do with the kids outside and the lake was a perfect place to relax and throw out a line. Come prepared for some big fish though, we lost our line twice to a big ol pike. Great memories for me and the kids! Thanks Traci and Chad for an awesome stay! We'll be back next year!
Great place for fishing and spending time outdoors!

This small getaway was perfect for our family!! We didn't have to leave it had everything we needed. SO much for everyone to do and not one kid (I took 4) ever said they were bored!! Can't get much better than that. Tracie and Chad made sure that we would be back and we are already planning next years adventure. I am looking forward to this already! So peaceful and relaxing. Thank you for sharing your piece of paradise with us!!

Great place to vacation. They had everything included, such as tubes, kayaks and games. It was very clean and had everything you needed on the inside of the cottage also. It was a very relaxing vacation.
Very nice place to stay, and it slept 6 of us comfortably. The house had everything we needed. Nothing but good things to say!
great quiet place on the water thats not far from town. host was awesome with answering any an all questions. great place for family get away
great place fishing was great, the home has everything to make a memorable weekend
Great cabin, will definitely stay here in the near future
It was a wonderful stay and a beautiful cabin we had a great time!!!

We enjoyed our stay in this cozy historic log cabin on the Muskegon River; something we've been wanting to do for several years since our retirement. We were not disappointed. Our hosts supplied us with necessary fresh linens, luxury robes, all things we would possibly need and surprised us with chilled wine and goblets ready for us in the frig. Thank you for sharing your cabin with us.
Great stay, wonderful hosts, amazing stay and definitely would stay here again!

We felt right at home and sincerely enjoyed our weekend getaway at the cabin. The view was wonderful, the hot tub was clean and ready for soaking, the river was beautiful, the bed was comfy, the bathrooms were spotless, the hosts were attentive and friendly - everything we could have hoped for! I highly recommend booking with Joannah & Mark! We look forward to returning.

We had the best time! This is the second time we’ve stayed here and it was great. The we came back for the hot tub on the river. It’s so peaceful and it was almost silent outside (other than the geese) the whole time we were there. Highly recommend getting up early to hit the hot tub in time for the sunrise. The place was clean, Johanna is great and responsive. The smoke alarm needed batteries and she brought them over right away. We hope to be back!
we had a lovely time at the cabin. It was everything we needed to be. Thank you so much.
Great little getaway.
The cabin is cozy, the surroundings peaceful, and the view of the river is beautiful. A great place for a getaway!
I WILL be booking again!!! So peaceful and beautiful!
Cozy cabin in the woods and only 5 mins from shopping and dining. The views are spectacular, hot tub was perfect and it’s great for a couple’s weekend away.
What a beautiful cottage! Thanks again
Host was responsive to questions, cabin was all we had hoped for and more
What a wonderful little cabin! This is a beautiful get-away, perfect for some relaxing time by the water. Amazing in every way, we are so glad we had the opportunity to visit this little log cabin!
The stay was amazing. Super clean, cozy and host were very responsive and flexible. definitely will be back!
Loved the views, the cozy space and the hot tub!

This is our third time visiting and we always love our stay. Cozy and quiet - full of relaxation in the outdoor hot tub looking onto the river or the comfy couch by the fireplace. We will be back again for sure!
Such a beautiful location!
The cabin was so cute, and a great spot for a private, peaceful, and much needed getaway! Excellent accomodations!
Cozy, cute cottage. Welcoming Holiday touches added to positive experience.

What a wonderful place. Right in the water and so cozy! My Son and I had a blast on our weekend away. We loved the location and the hot tub was brilliant. The weather turned quite cold while we were there but between the hot tub and the fireplace we stayed warm and had a blast. Don't hesitate. Book it!
Beautiful rustic cabin experience. Enjoyed the views and extras. We will be going back.
Very nice stay, and I was comfortable and cozy the whole time. It is very clean as well and plenty of space for my wife and I.

My husband and I enjoyed our stay so much that we hardly left the cabin! Everything was so inviting and exactly as described. The bed was comfortable, and everything was very clean. Joannah was such a gracious host and responded anytime I had a question. I'd definitely stay here again, it was well worth the price!
Beautiful home and a lovely area - we absolutely loved seeing all the Michigan fall colors! There’s a pumpkin patch and corn maze nearby which made a great fall activity, too

My husband and I had a wonderful, relaxing time at Joannah's cabin. The cabin is cozy and well kept. Everything was well thought of. We enjoyed the hot tub very much!
Joannah was so easy to communicate with and made us feel very welcomed. We got a great video and photos of the eagle on the river! That just made our stay even better. We will definitely plan another stay in the future.

What a cozy little cabin, and such a peaceful, beautiful location. We absolutely loved the deck and the screened in porch. We sat out there and drank our coffee every morning and even saw a bald eagle fly over the river. The perfect little cabin for a weekend getaway

If you are tall you may want to reconsider this location. The main bedroom has a very low ceiling and the door nob to enter the cabin is very low even for me (5ft1) I had to squat to reach. It's definitely a cute cabin with a few add ons to give it a nice atmosphere. The fireplace upstairs is controlled by the thermostat so you'll definitely want to use the heater downstairs to help regulate or you will get very cold. Be careful with the shower in the basement they do have a note that it tasks a while to heat up but when it's where you're comfortable you'll want to be diligent so it doesn't burn you. Only two of the jets worked in the hot tub but due to the rain we were only able to use one of the jetted seats because that area of the tub isn't covered. There's a few areas in the carpets you'll want to be careful there's some tacks that are poking up. They did have champagne, glasses, and chocolates ready for us for our anniversary weekend which was nice.

Perfect couples getaway! Close enough to Big Rapids to go to dinner but far enough away to feel secluded. Very quiet and peaceful. Hot tub was nice it sit in at night. Bring binoculars if you like to watch the birds- there are a lot on the river! Comfy bed and blankets. Screened in porch was cozy and the perfect place to read a book. Highly recommend for a relaxing trip.

The cottage was very clean. The area was quiet and peaceful. we enjoyed watching all the birds on the water. The hot tub was clean and very relaxing. It was the perfect getaway for me and my husband. The host was responsive and friendly.
Great

We had a great stay. The cabin is really cozy and the river view is amazing. We really enjoyed the screened in porch and the hot tub. We went kayaking and saw a bald eagle and egrets. We also rode our bikes around the neighborhood and hiked the White Pine trails. It was a great stay, exactly what we needed.

We had such a wonderful stay at this cabin!The host is excellent. The cabin beautiful and fully stocked, even with things you wouldn’t expect, like coffee, paper towels and toilet paper. My husband and I really enjoyed relaxing in the hot tub overlooking the Muskegon River. We gifted the last couple days to my daughter and son in law. The enjoyed the paddle boat and kayaks! We look forward to visiting again!
Joannah made everything easy! And the cottage was even more homier than the pics! Your view is just incredible and we will definitely be back!!! Thank you!
Very cute cabin, would highly recommend it!

Loved our memorial day weekend here! We really enjoyed the paddleboat, kayaks, and hot tub. The place was perfect for two to enjoy the peaceful riverfront. No air conditioning, but we made it work with the fans provided! We’ll definitely be back!

This little cabin on the river was everything my boyfriend and I were looking for to celebrate our one year anniversary. It was cozy, clean, and the property is absolutely beautiful. We were able to have bonfires, cook in the grill, take the kayaks out and enjoy the hot tub. We highly recommend this place and will be returning yearly!
This cabin was cute and served our stay. The shower situation was different, but worked for us. Beautiful little cabin.
Enjoyed stay again and would recommend.

The cabin was exactly what I had hoped, the view from the hot tub can’t be beat! It is very well appointed, and they make it very easy to get in, enjoy your stay, and get out. Thanks for a great stay!

The home was absolutely lovely. We went out for my wife's 30th. Sadly it was cold and rainy the whole time but we were able to spend the whole trip enjoying the peace and quiet on the river from the hot tub. Bird watching was great. The one thing I will say is that the pictures do not do the place justice. Would love yo return later in the summer time to enjoy outdoor activities in the area.
Perfect little place
The cabin was everything we wanted ! We appreciated the special touches.
Beautiful surroundings. Very clean and relaxing. Responsive host. Will return.
One of the best Airbnb stays I’ve had! The cabin was perfect for our weekend away. We will definitely be back!

This place was wonderful! We are city people and were in desperate need of a small town, quiet get away. This little cabin was super cute and cozy. We spent most of our time in the hot tub relaxing and listening to nature on the lake. The view was amazing watching the sun rise over the lake on the screened in patio and the sun setting on the lake from the hot tub. We will definitely be back.

Great romantic getaway cabin!
Loved our stay!
We look forward to visiting and staying here again.
The cozy Cabin was everything and more. A Stocked kitchen with utensils and everything you need to cook meals with.
Cozy bedroom with a comfortable bed.
I loved the Hot tub with a wonderful relaxing view of the river.

This is such a gem! My boyfriend and I stayed for the weekend and I was wishing we could stay longer. Small, but has everything you need. Hot tub is fantastic. Close to great trails.
Stayed very warm all weekend and we hope to come back!

The host is great and very responsive! The hot tub is awesome with a great view of the River. The cabin is super cozy and perfect for a quiet getaway. This is our 3rd time coming here, that's how much we enjoy it.
It was absolutely gorgeous, worth every penny. Very quaint and homey.
This Little Cabin on the River was a perfect getaway! Clean, cozy, and exceeded our expectations. We would definitely stay here again.

I stayed here for a long weekend for my birthday. It was such a great weekend. The cabin was so cute and cozy. My favorite part was the hot tub. Beautiful scenery overlooking the river. Joannah was a wonderful host. She was very quick to reply to any messages I sent and she also left cupcakes for my birthday! I would definitely stay here again!

This cabin was perfect for a winter getaway! Beautiful river view (awesome to enjoy from the hot tub), cozy feel with the fireplace, and overall great for a little vacation. The hosts were super accommodating and helpful as well, they even came and plowed/shoveled the walkway when we had a storm mid stay! Would recommend!
the cabin was a great relaxing time for my wife and I away from the kids.
Great place to visit and have pretty good and comfy stay at a beautiful cabin in front the lake.
We absolutely loved the cabin! It was beautiful and peaceful exactly what we needed. Living and working in a big city like Chicago sometimes we just need a break and this was perfect for that!
Very peaceful and beautiful view! Enjoyed every minute!

Great spot for our anniversary weekend! The house is small but very cozy, the fireplace was great! Stayed very warm all weekend. Beautiful views of the river from the house and the hot tub! We also enjoyed getting to do some snowy hikes on nearby trails in county and state parks.
Great place to spend a couple of days away from the city, relax, enjoy the view of the river was wonderful.
The cabin was a great place to visit and spend a relaxing weekend. It is very warm cozy little spot, and the hot tub over looking the river is wonderful. 10/10-Would visit again

What a wonderful experience!
Great space, great location and great host! Would book again 10/10!
Beautiful! The coziest little place. Great hosts, great experience

My partner and I had a wonderful time staying here over the Christmas holiday! The host very very accommodating with us due to the winter storm that came through. The cabin was soooo cozy and we loved looking out on the snowy river while relaxing in the hot tub. 11/10 would stay again!
The place was cozy and the hot tub was wonderful. The host made sure we were aware of attractions in the area which was appreciated.

We came here for our mini-moon right after our wedding. The hot tub was so relaxing and situated right in the perfect spot to see bald eagles and lots of other wild life on the river. We headed to Grand Rapids for dinner one night, which was about an hour away. This was a very peaceful getaway and we will definitely be returning!
Great cabin getaway for the weekend. Everything we needed. The hot tub was very clean and had great views of the river. My wife loved the coziness the fireplace provided. Highly recommend.

Had a wonderful stay at Joannah's cabin! Pictures do not capture how cute & cozy this place is, and the location is absolutely gorgeous! My husband and I had everything we needed for a quiet Thanksgiving getaway. The cabin was thoughtfully stocked with all the necessary amenities & carefully cleaned. The fireplace kept the cabin wonderfully warm, and the hot tub was delightful. The view of the river was breathtaking (we even caught a glimpse of the bald eagle)! We would definitely return to this lovely location.
GREAT!!!!!! There is nothing negative to say about this place!!!!!

Amazing place and perfect area! Not too far from town to grab some things from the store, and close to a few nature walks/hikes. Backyard is perfect for just hanging out and taking in the views as well as a nice hot tub to compliment. Would definitely stay here again, good for 2 people or 4-5 people with all the space and great space use in the basement.

This place had everything we wanted for our anniversary getaway. Lovely wooded area, quite neighborhood and picturesque lace. It felt nice and secluded, but only a few minutes from downtown Big Rapids. Also, the outdoor hot tub with lack view was wonderful.

Staying at Joannah's Lil' Log Cabin was such a nice getaway for my husband and me. We were able to incorporate his business trip with some fun without staying at another boring hotel. The cabin was accurately described online and it did not disappoint. For a cozy little cottage it had everything we needed to relax and enjoy ourselves including the comfy bed, fireplace, beautiful river scenery, fire pit and other well thought out amenities. The host offered quick response times and very helpful check in and out information and also additional details for places to visit and eat in the area. The restaurants recommended by the host that we tried were equally outstanding! Our favorite part of the stay was the hot tub overlooking the river and the wildlife. It made for a spectacular way to start and end the day! Thank you, Joannah! We would definitely stay again if work or play brings us back to Big Rapids in the future!
Great place on the water. Quiet, peaceful, a nice getaway. Great view and amenities. Clean and well maintained. Would love to go back.
Great place and location. We went to get away and enjoy peace and quiet. That is exactly what it was.

This was a beautiful place for our first wedding anniversary! They had everything you need. The hot tub was a plus and we enjoyed ever second of it. Nature was so beautiful with the Muskegon river. It was so peaceful. Highly recommend!
the view is beautiful. quiet & cozy cabin.
Great host. Excelent communication. Great location
We enjoyed our weekend on the river. We recommend this stay to others

The cabin is perfect.... cute, clean, comfortable..great views.... the bald eagle loves to hunt in the shallows right behind the cabin... we saw it every day... magnificent creature!!! We were able to access the river easily from the back yard .. the kayaks were great. We could paddle upstream without any difficulty and then float back.... it was fantastic....
We had a small issue of our own doing, but Joannah responded immediately... it was a fabulous weekend!!!
Great little perfect cabin to get away & relax! Very peaceful area-beautiful views of the river/sunrise & sunset! Will definitely book again!!!
Amazing view and the sandbar was so fun! Loved being around the fire at night!
Perfect cabin in the perfect location. Views are second to none! We will be back.

My wife and I had a nice few days at this cozy cabin with river-front access. First of all, the 4-person hot-tub with river-view was fantastic - new, hot, and clean. The cabin has most modern appliances that were clean and worked, just a bit outdated. Standing functional shower in the basement - nothing fancy but was clean and the water was hot. The bedroom is very small but more importantly the bed was very comfortable. Comfortable couch and chair in front of the gas fireplace/TV. Full kitchen except for dishwasher. Screened-in porch and small front deck with beautiful river view- saw the local osprey catch a fish right in front of the property! Great bird-watching besides the osprey - saw a bald eagle, woodpeckers, swans, herons, ducks/geese. Kayaks/accessories were provided - the water front is fine for kayaking and fishing but not great swimming access.
Besides the cabin itself, the location is fantastic as it is in a quiet wooded neighborhood with no highway noise, yet a very short drive to Big Rapids. Besides all the restaurants and stuff in Big Rapids, there were also several parks, trails, and a nice winery within an easy drive. All in all, if you don't mind an older outdated cabin, it is a great, clean get-away option!
Great little house with great views. Check in was easy and it was close to Big Rapids with good food options. Would definitely recommend.

What value! Charming, cozy, clean and well appointed cabin. This place had everything we needed to feel like we could relax in peace and quiet without breaking our budget but with the addition of the hot tub we got to feel like our stay had been upgraded. We have decided we would like to return in the winter and maybe hope to get snowed in!!

Great little cabin. Beautiful setting. Hot tub was wonderful to unwind at night even in the cool temps. Robes were a nice touch. Fire pit looked great, unfortunately due to windy weather we were unable to use it. Joannah was very responsive to questions . Would definitely recommend.
Great little cabin

stop looking ...book it now!! This is possibly the best Airbnb in Michigan. the hot tub is perfect for all time but even better on chilly night then you come in to a nice warm fire. if your into fishing your in a pretty good spot. croton and tippy dams are within driving distance bot to mention rodgers. the river in the backyard also has some good fish. perfect getaway for couples cant recomend enough.

My boyfriend and I loved our stay here. The hot tub on a chilly night was amazing. The sun rise over the river was an incredible view glowing through the windows in the morning. Joannah was incredibly accommodating, kind, and had amazing and quick communication. I hope to come back when it’s warmer to enjoy the sand bar and kayaks. Check in and out were both very easy. The house is a great distance from town. Out of the way, but convenient enough to get what you need and grab a great bite to eat :)
Our second stay was just as good as the first. Super cozy, everything we needed, great communication, and the hot tub let us enjoy the view and being outside even though it was snowing in April!
A very lovely cabin. Everything you need for a convenient stay with no stress. We went to Hemlock Park (12 minute drive) and it had a really great playground for the kids!
Prefect cabin for a couple, great location and hot tub.
We loved our stay! Beautiful place with an amazing location! We will definitely be back as a family!

10/10 would recommend and would visit again! So homey and cozy and the perfect place to take a break. From the porch, to the views, to the fireplace, to the hot tub, this place allows for maximum relaxation. Also Joannah has such wonderful hospitality and communication!

This spot is perfect! The cabin is cozy and inviting, and Joannah’s thoughtful touches make the experience so comfortable. The hot tub is clear and overlooks the river, which was a relaxing way to end each day. Have coffee on the back deck and watch the sun come up, or play cards on the screened in porch. We never wanted to leave, and can’t wait to come back!
We feel like we've discovered a secret! This place is just that awesome. How can it not be booked an entire year in advance? It's a perfect place to just tuck away and ignore the world.
All of the thoughtful amenities provided, a cozy fireplace, robes for the hottub, coffee and kitchen supplies, make this the perfect spot for a carefree getaway, any time of year
We very much appreciate all the little touches like the robes and slippers, also the willingness to provide wood and fire starter. This place is THE perfect little get away.

We had a wonderful and relaxing two day stay at the cabin. It was super cozy, warm fireplace and the hot tub felt amazing! We would love to visit during the summer months to take advantage of the kayaks and river.
Our family loved it. The host even left some cars out for our kids and a little treat. The hot tub was immaculate and the whole space was just as cozy as could be.
Perfect for a romantic weekend. Loved the hot tub and fireplace. Would definitely consider returning for a summer getaway too.

Lovely little cabin to enjoy a few days escape with the wife. Stayed here during the winter, but would definitely look at coming back again in the summer to fully enjoy the space and location, despite being 6'5" and having to take care not to crash my head into a few of the tighter spots :)
Perfect little get away to be cozy and relax. The little touches were perfect and appreciated!
Cute, cozy, and clean little cabin on the river. Loved the hot tub. Nice little getaway! Also appreciated how warm it stayed in the cabin. Would definitely stay again!

Perfect couples getaway with a private hot tub overlooking the river! The hosts were super helpful with providing info on local amenities, though you may find it hard to want to head into town. Perfectly cozy for two, be aware that the fireplace is electric, and that half the fire pit is inaccessible due to its proximity to a cliff. We will be back!
Extremely clean and cozy spot! Well stocked with everything needed for a great riverside getaway in any season. Hope to return again sometime :)

The check in and out process was so easy. The cabin was very cozy and we loved the fireplace. The hot tub was a fun added bonus. We just went away a a couple in the winter time but you could have a lot of fun with kids also.

Myself, my husband, and a couple friends had a blast during our stay. The cabin had so much adorable character, and the view of the river felt like a winter wonderland. We LOVED the fireplace, plants, welcome chocolates, robes, and overall feeling of our stay. A majority of our time was spent in the four-person hot tub, which was easy to operate and perfectly warm. Overall, our time at the cabin was extremely cozy. We had everything we could’ve needed while we were there. Not to mention - the host’s communication with us was incredible. It was easy and fun! Thanks, Joannah and Mark! We look forward to staying with you again.

If you're looking for a rustic cabin with modern amenities, this is the place for you! Joannah went above and beyond as a host to provide a comfortable stay. She checked nearly every box of things I look for in an airbnb: HOT hot tub (with robes provided!), fire pit, gorgeous views, quiet neighborhood with privacy from surrounding neighbors, super plush towels, well-stocked toilet paper/soap/a variety of kitchen utensils, gas fireplace (which was easy to operate from wall thermostat), smart TV, comfy couch, firm and comfortable bed. The shower head could be updated, but the water was hot so it was fine! Joannah responded to messages quickly and offered excellent suggestions of things to do in the area. Parking and check-in were easy and the property was well-lit (we arrived after dark.) We enjoyed our winter getaway very much!
beautiful little cabin surrounded by nature! An amazing stay during the winter, and just the place I want to be when the weather is so cold!
Great spot for a nice little getaway, cozy cabin right on the river with a hot tub, gas fireplace, and outdoor firepit.
Quaint beautiful cabin with a spectacular view. Wonderful hot tub.
We loved our stay! Thank you so so much!!! Happy Holidays!
This is such a cozy, beautiful, peaceful place. Joannah is a gracious and communicative host, and the view and serenity from the cabin are top notch. 10/10 would recommend.
Perfect cozy up north get away - loved the hot tub, fireplace, and view!
Great Cabin hope to go back...
Awesome place, amazing host, fantastic experience! Definitely coming back

Great quaint little place. Very quiet and absolutely ideal for the two of us. Close to a lot of places if you want to go out to eat. Real easy to find and again so quiet. Hot tub was perfect and views in mid November were just right. We surely will be back here!

Absolutely perfect stay. The cabin was toasty warm, easy to find, and super clean. Host super responsive and kind with helping us with the gas fireplace (silly thing on our part!). Perfect blend of rustic getaway but modern amenities. The hot tub was AMAZING. Great restaurants nearby in the cute college town about 10 minutes drive. Absolutely cannot wait to go back.
It’s very nice and beautiful Cabin and clean we spend great Family time at the lake The house is very comfy place and you have everything you need there and the owner was very nice
Nice and cozy. Everything was great!
This little place is an amazing getaway and a wonderful location! We went for our honeymoon and plan to make it a yearly visit!

We had such a wonderful time at Joannah and Mark’s cabin! Cozy and warm, with beautiful views of the river and wildlife. Close enough to town to make a supply run or go out to eat; yet far enough away to feel like you’re in a cabin up north.

We have been to many little Air B & B cabins and cottages and this ranks among top. Lovely, cozy, charming, there has been so much thought put into utilizing the space. Loved the screened in porch, deck, & hot tub; would make a peaceful retreat in the winter months as well. Lots of wildlife on this particular part of the river. Great internet & TV options, well stocked kitchen. Really nothing overlooked by the owners.
amazing location, great fishing, beautiful home away from home. already looking for when we can make another visit!
Great place to stay at right on thr river. Owners are very nice and helpful. Perfect little cabin to get away.
The cabin was great! My wife and I enjoyed a few relaxing days there. highly recommend it!
Nice place, beautiful spot to watch the river.
All the amenities qt the cabin kept us there all weekend. No need to venture out. The river was beautiful! The wildlife qnd it was the cutest little cabin.

Amazing stay! Quiet, cozy, and the view of the river is beautiful! Stocked with everything we needed for a weekend getaway with our three kids. Having both the river, and hot tub kept our kids very busy & happy. We loved being able to use the kayaks and get out to the sandbar where we were able to swim and look for clams! Very clean, it felt inviting as soon as we walked in. Joanna was absolutely wonderful with communication and made everything so easy. Would definitely recommend!
We could not recommend this place more!! Small but spacious, nestled into a quiet lake community. Perfect getaway place!
great place
Super cute cabin with a beautiful view of the river!
It was very wonderful and beautiful and quite and we really enjoyed staying at the cabin and kayaking and fishing and the bonfires and the walks it was a great vacation

The cabin was so quaint and a bit rustic. It was the perfect romantic getaway. The cabin was very clean and had everything that we needed for our weekend stay. The best part was waking up to watch the sunrise and having coffee on the screened in porch. I would absolutely return in the summer months to enjoy the water.
This place is exactly as described. Really nice location, beautifully quiet when we stayed here. The river walk in town is a nice place to visit.

This little cabin is the perfect getaway for a couple or a family! We had a wonderful stay and there was no need to even leave the cabin! The view is wonderful and the hot tub is the perfect extra bonus! Highly recommend

We had an amazing stay at the Little Log Cabin, which was full of wonderful little touches and had anything you would need, from cooking essentials to bathrobes for the hot tub to a cozy blanket by the fireplace. The weather was great and we went out on the river in the kayaks and the paddleboat. The hot tub has an excellent view of the river and the grill was perfect for cooking burgers whole overlooking the water. We highly recommend it!

This cabin is everything you want for a getaway. The deck upstairs overlooks the river (more like a lake!) which is perfect for your morning coffee. Big rapids has great trails and Joannah & mark have kayaks for you to use. They also have a hot tub that overlooks the river! Every detail, down to the robes and pancake mix, are so kind and welcoming. Cannot recommend enough.

The pictures and descriptions do not do this little cabin or location justice at all! Our family of four (we have a teenager and a 4 yr old) enjoyed the cabin for 3 days and we did not want to leave. My husband and I really enjoyed our stay at this little cabin - the space itself was cute and cleverly designed, and the hot tub was a PERFECT addition to the wonderful view of the river. Great communication from the host
Cannot recommend enough. Right on the river! Everything you could ask for (hot tub was fantastic) You simply will not find better hosts!
Very relaxing and enjoyable stay. We loved using the hot tub and drinking coffee on the patio in the sun in the morning!
The cabin was a quiet retreat with a lot of extras available for use, we would stay here again if we’re in the area
We had the perfect getaway weekend. The home is so cozy and the hot tub on the river is incredible.

Super cozy top to bottom, great views from the cabin up and down the river, very comfy bed, and a super attentive hostess. Worth it all day long. We will most likely return.
We really enjoyed our time at the cabin, I highly recommend visiting here. Every aspect of our visit was enjoyable, Joannah is a lovely host and very thoughtful about every detail.
Joannah’s little log cabin was exactly what we needed. It was easy to find and had everything we needed.
this cabin in the woods was better than advertised. had an amazing stay and will be back.
they are amazing. and the place is so cute!

Such a quaint cabin! A bit rustic, but that added it's charm. The hot tub iswhat sold us on the place, but I think we would come back in the summer to enjoy the outdoors and river without going in the hot tub.

She had a lotof recommendations for us on things to do in the area including a great sledding hill!
A fantastic stay!

Beautiful view and super convenient location with excellent hosts. We would definitely visit again!
Beautiful views! Joannah was very attentive and caring. Would love to come back
great place with an amazing view. the hot tub was perfect and made for a great winter getaway
It was very cozy! Joannah was very kind and helpful. She gave good suggestions for places around town and was quick to respond when I had questions!
Very cute and cozy rustic stay on the river. Perfect for a winter getaway and we really enjoyed the hot tub! The owners are extremely accommodating and communicative if any issues arise.
We took a mini- honeymoon in this cute little cottage! We had such a good time taking a step away from all of the business, and just spending time together. Such a good time! We will be back!

This is such a nice cozy cabin! We came in the winter and had so much fun, it must be a blast in the summer! The cabin is a little quirky, but it is very charming and its quirks never got in the way of a great trip.
A very nice place to stay.
Had a really great time! Cabin was very cozy and had everything we needed. Great view and fantastic communication with Joannah. Thank you!
An adorable cabin with a stellar view of the river! We felt right at home in this cozy space!

It was an adorable place to stay. Cozy, thoughtgully decorated, perfect for a winter escape. We loved watching the river change as the snow fell over our stay. It was very clean and provided plenty of extra blankets or fans depending on the weather. We wish we could have stayed longer

Joannah's place on the river was a perfect getaway over our holiday break. There are some nice trails nearby (NCT - North Country Trail) and White Pine Trail and there was also plenty to keep us busy around the cabin as well. Thank you!

You can expect a relaxing and thoughtful stay in a cozy cabin with touches of home. A lovely, cozy little retreat on the water. The cabin is so neat and comfortable and really well maintained. So cool watching the bald eagles flying over the water from the deck! The cabin is very nice. The space is set up for small groups to mid size groups. Very clean with beautiful setting on the river. Nice fire pit out back. Very easy to find and close to the city for any needs. The host was very quick to respond to any questions

The home was very clean, but inviting. Everything was easy to locate and the the view from the deck is absolutely amazing!
The tub was very much appreciated and there was plenty of hot water.

Zachary goes above and beyond to make guests feel special and welcome! The house is very private and peaceful. Nice place with every you need and it is kept very clean.

This place is the best! We have stayed in many Air BnB, but never with an amazing host like Zach

We’ve stayed in a lot of Airbnb’s and Zachary’s place is one of our favorites. This was our second stay in his place. We came up for our dating anniversary in September and left engaged, so when we started planning another trip up from Indiana to visit family, we went right to this listing to see if it was available again. We were so pleased to find that it was, and we booked again without hesitation.
First and foremost, Zachary is one heck of a host. There simply aren’t any others out there like him. He goes the extra mile without being intrusive. He always leaves the place with candles burning everywhere, fresh flowers, and happy music playing upon entry, which really sets the tone for the whole stay. This time, we came in to find rose petals on the bed, and a box of chocolate covered strawberries.
Now, for the place itself—both living rooms are perfect for chilling. We always have a hard time picking which one we want to spend our time in. Both sofas are perfect for tv watching or curling up with a book.
The kitchen is equipped with modern conveniences that most don’t have at home, so it’s a great place to cook or make a snack.
The bedroom is cozy, and the bed and pillows are FABULOUS. Be prepared to have a great night’s sleep!
Now, for the bathroom. The shower is amazing but the bathtub is a dream. My husband and I both enjoy that the most when we are there. The closet is stocked with fluffy towels (and once you try that bathtub you’ll go through them quickly).
The deck with beautiful view of Roger’s Pond is the best. When we visited in the summer, we enjoyed opening the French doors up so we could have an outdoor feel inside. This time, the pond was frozen and gave the feels of a perfect winter wonderland.
If I could give this place AND Zachary ten stars, I would. If you’re visiting western Michigan, look no further for your perfect retreat. We will rebook every time we are in the area.
Zachary’s house is beautiful, spotless and has picturesque views. He went out of his way to make our weekend special and romantic. You will not be disappointed if you stay here!

We were looking for some much needed downtime for a short weekend, and found the perfect location just for two. Zachary took those extra steps that many locations don’t to ensure we had a memorable and relaxing weekend together. Highly recommend this spot overlooking the Muskegon River for anyone looking for quiet. Thank you 🙏 we hope to be back soon.

Beautiful setting on a lake. Decor is sleek and stylish. Wifi worked amazing. Kitchen was well stocked and the only thing we missed was a can opener (thank God for Google hacks, lol). A terrific host and a terrific setup for a beautiful weekend getaway!

Overall, would highly recommend, especially if you are looking for a well-appointed lake house to just relax at for a few days.

This was an amazing stay! Definitely one of the best AirBnb experiences we had. Zach was there to give us a warm welcome and show us around. Definitely take him up on the kayaks.
