First impression of the house was that it was far better than the photos looked. It’s so clean and newly renovated. We appreciated the extra touches, such as candles lit in every room, fresh roses, and soft music. Zachary did an excellent job of making sure we walked right into a romantic space!
We ended up getting engaged on this trip, so this will always be a great space for memories for us. Hopefully we can stay again sometime soon!
If I could give this Airbnb ten stars, I would. Everything was just incredible. You won’t be disappointed if you book this place! Zachary is the best host you could ever ask for, too!
Phenomenal stay! What a fantastic vacation and relaxing weekend!

This was a perfect trip! We were looking for a quieter place to stay away from the city, and Zachary's spot was above and beyond great for a mini vacation. His house was super comfortable with surprising high-tech touches, lovely bathroom, and lots of space. And the deck and kayaks really made it a memorable vacation overall. Thanks for a great trip!
This is a wonderful place to vacation. You will not be sorry I promise.

We enjoyed Zachary's gorgeous lake house so much. The lake view was so calming and beautiful and the stars at night were something we haven't seen for a long time. We enjoyed the stay so much and hope to come back sometime in the future.

If there is one thing Zach has nailed when it comes to his Airbnb, is his hospitality and his willingness to accommodate. He went out of his way repeatedly to ensure my fiancé and I had a memorable trip. It honestly was worth every penny and more!
Wonderful house overlooking beautiful lake. What's there not to like.
This place was absolutely amazing for a weekend getaway! It was everything we could have asked for and then some! Couldn’t recommend it any more highly 👌!
Zach is a superb host who communicates throughout your stay. The house is clean, sharp and incredible comfortable.

We had an excellent experience and the place was amazing and very clean. Zach was a great host and the location was much better than expected. Being right on the lake was awesome! I highly recommend it!

My boyfriend and I had a wonderful long weekend at Zach’s place. The house had a great lakefront view, was immaculate, and the kitchen was well stocked with all you need for summer grilling. We took the kayaks that we rented from Zach for two days around the lake and up/down the river — the water was very calm so it was great to just hang out and not have to paddle all the time! Stairs down to the lake looked tricky but we managed. Check in was seamless — Zach was very communicative and put in some nice welcoming touches. Highly recommended for city folks trying to get away for a weekend!

Spotless and stylish cabin right on a lake with a gorgeous overlooking views. Easy access down a stair case for kayaking and fishing. Zachary was very responsive regarding our trip, check-in was very quick but thorough, and we were even given a very thoughtful gift-basket (including bubbles) that really added to the romantic get away vibe of the cabin. Really enjoyed our cabin on the lake get-away, and would certainly recommend this place to everyone.
You will love every moment.

A great place with an amazing view! A perfect place to kick back and relax. The house was super clean and modernized. Zachary was a great host! The kitchen has all the little things you need to make meals. Kayaking on the lake was so much fun! We only wish we could have stayed longer... but we will definitely be back!

The view from the deck is amazing! The house was spotless when we arrived. Zach is a very enthusiastic and accessible host. He was very easy to work with and was very prompt to respond to any questions we had. This was a perfect house for my wife and I to escape to craziness of the big city and unwind for a few days. Zach even made sure to have wi-fi set up prior to our arrival so that my wife could work remotely, and he gave us a great deal on renting his kayaks!

Zachary is an incredible host, met us at the beginning of our stay to do a walk through, and has an incredible place. Everything was as clean as could be, on top of lots of thoughtful touches, including a gift basket. On top of that, he rented us his kayaks for an amazing price, and filled us in with tons of local information and suggestions. He is quick to respond, and eager to help wherever possible. The water was fantastic and we truly had an wonderful time. Best Airbnb experience I’ve had, hands down.

We couldn't have been more pleased with our stay. This little slice of sanctuary conveniently tucked away within a short drive to all possible needs and amenities was exactly what we needed! We are already looking at when we can make our way back for another respite in luxury! Zachary went above and beyond and his cleanliness and attention to care and detail gave us exactly what we needed and more. Thank you from the bottoms of our hearts.

A truly remarkable stay! Zack is a host that truly cares and wants his guests to have the best possible stay, and it shows from the moment you walk in the home. The pictures do not do it enough justice.
The space itself is gorgeous. It’s clear that it has been fully remodeled very recently. The kitchen has all brand new appliances that worked perfectly, and Zack has all the essentials stocked in terms of silverware, utensils, salt, pepper, olive oil, etc. We also used the grill multiple times and had zero issues with anything. The bathroom has an incredible shower and a tub that make them hard to want to get out of. The bed was very comfortable and there was plenty of living space to enjoy. Everything in the house worked exactly as expected, we had zero issues.
The main highlight of our stay was the view of the lake, and the access down to it. The house is tucked away on the lake, with it being one of the only homes around that have a lake view. The stairs down to the water are a little bit sketchy, but extremely worth it to venture down! If you’re able, inquire about renting Zack’s kayaks. He gave us a great price and we spent 6+ hours on them in 2 days. The view is absolutely gorgeous when you’re out on the water. There isn’t much boat traffic around the house and if you venture a little bit down the river you’ll run into a sand bar that is a must stop! Between the kayaks and the view from the deck, Zack’s home is one of a kind. We will absolutely be back!

Zachary’s place is better than the pictures or descriptions can capture. The place is sparkling clean. The view and grounds are beautiful. This is an amazing weekend or longer getaway for couples. The jetted tub and massive spotless bathroom are well appreciated.
You’ll have everything you need to cook and the finishes are simply beautiful. We didn’t need anything from Zachary during our stay but he checked in just to make sure all was well and gave us that space to really take in this one of a kind property.
We look forward to coming back in the near future.

Highly recommend this place to any couple looking to get away and relax on the lake for a few nights. Zach is an awesome host and hooks it up nicely. Guaranteed to have a good time if you stay here. Big rapids isn't too far and there is a good amount to do there but honestly, if you are able to take advantage of the house being right on the edge of the water then you may not even have to leave! Enjoy
Zachary’ place was perfect for our weekend getaway. The location was easy to find, very quiet and the lake was beautiful. The house was very clean and had everything we needed.
Place was amazing very beautiful an Zach was a great host

Zach was very friendly, and accommodating! He was there to show us a round when we got there, and was in communication leading up to and during our stay!
These pictures do not do this house justice!!! The view alone was worth every penny!!! It’s in a very private area on the water, perfect for couples trying to have a relaxing weekend away! This house was spotless!
10/10 I would recommend staying at this home if you ever get the chance!

This was our second stay at this beautiful hidden gem! My wife and I can’t get enough of the peace and comfort that this place has! Teresa and David are amazing hosts ! From the farm animals to the quiet woods and cozy cabin this place has become a regular stay for us!!
Wonderful hosts for a wonderful stay!! David and Teresa were excellent and we loved our nights in the cabin

Absolutely loved my stay, wish I had booked another night! The cabin is perfect, better than the pictures and their property is absolutely beautiful. So many friendly animals, and a great spot to reconnect with nature and feel at peace.

I wish I could give more than 5 stars. Teresa and David were an absolute pleasure to meet. They were friendly and helpful. The pictures don’t even describe how beautiful the cabin was. Just walking the property, we saw more wildlife than you can imagine. The cabin was very cozy, with amenities you wouldn’t even think to expect, such as slippers and fuzzy blankets. The view of the pond was absolutely beautiful. We will frequently visit this cabin. Absolutely perfect for a quick getaway.
Teresa was a very sweet and helpful host! Her cabin was even cozier than what I imagined. It was the perfect getaway surrounded by nature and cute farm animals.

Teresa and her husband were so welcoming and helped us get settled in. She gave us a tour of their beautiful farm and introduced us to the animals. The cabin itself is very cozy and comfortable and a great place to relax. We enjoyed exploring the property, feeding the animals, picking apples and pears, and admiring scenic views. At night, we enjoyed the fire pit, stargazing, and listening to coyotes howl. It was such a peaceful weekend getaway for us that it's a must that we go back. We are extremely grateful to our host.

my favorite experience I’ve had so far on Airbnb. Beautiful property, amazing hosts, and the most sweet animals. Their cats are a real pleasure & it’s a great place for a relaxing stay. Would definitely recommend to others and even make a 2nd trip!

It’s a great place to spend the weekend. The cabin was very clean and fully equipped with all the little details that might be needed during the stay. Teresa and her husband were so nice with us, she was very responsive to our needs. They helped us load our staff and drove us to the cabin, they showed us everything around, all the animals were friendly and we were free to go to visit them whenever we wanted. The location is great, the best place to have long late talks by the fire, the lake view was great to enjoy the morning coffee. Also there was a small boat and a zip line to have fun by the lake. This was one of the best stays so far, looking forward to go back!

Give yourself the break you deserve and book this experience. I say experience because it’s so much more than an overnight stay. Not only does Teresa equip the cabin with everything you could think of needing (firewood, paper towel, extra blankets, coffee, cozy lighting, etc.), but it has things you may not have realized you needed (a cat that follows you like a puppy, the cutest cows you’ve ever seen, fresh apples & pears from trees around the property, a beautiful sunset over a freshly harvested field, monopoly by candlelight). This experience gets you back to the simple things in life, which in todays age I find to be extremely valuable. Thank you, Teresa!

If I knew before I would definitely visit more often this place!
It’s amazing and very peaceful,it’s really perfect for someone who wants to have really nice vacation and rest!
Beautiful cabin and location!

Our stay at Teresa's rustic cabin was a refreshing two-night retreat. The property, with its tranquil pond and friendly farm animals, provided a peaceful backdrop, and Pauly the Cat was an endearing addition to our experience.
Teresa's love for Jesus Christ is evident not just in the serene environment she's curated but also in her actions as a host. Every corner of the property reflects her faith, and her warmth and hospitality were a testament to her deep-rooted beliefs.
Thank you, Teresa, for making our stay comfortable and spiritually enriching. We truly felt the essence of love and kindness throughout our visit.
Charming location and wonderful hosts. Great stay and would definitely stay again.

Our stay was incredible!! Such a beautiful place with unreal scenery, weather, cute animals, an amazing cabin and hosts. The cabin was so well equipped, it had everything we needed and more. We also really enjoyed making a fire while listening to nature, cooking on the fire, walking around the farm and riding the boat on the little pond. Pauly the kitty was the best company too 🥰 Overall, it was beyond our expectations. Thank you so much!!
This was an absolutely beautiful setting. Back to nature with all the essentials. It was easy to forget we were off grid. Thanks for sharing your slice of heaven.

Staying in a cabin with grandchildren is the best!
Many thanks for the lovely, rustic, but charming spot.
We loved the farm animals. And the welcoming family.
We'll be back!

Teresa and her place are amazing. From the warm greeting upon arrival to the lovely chat with her husband when we left our experience was better than we could have imagined. I know how trite that sounds but my 10-year old was wishing we had more time and wanting to plan a return trip within 10 minutes of getting to the cabin!
After loading our belongings onto the 4X4 we got a tour of the farm on the way to the cabin. The farm is so well cared for and beautifully kept. I cannot adequately describe the first glimpse of the cabin and surrounding area. The cabin is the perfect size, and Teresa has thought of absolutely everything. It's just beautiful and the personal touches are so very thoughtful.
Outside you'll find a covered picnic table, with well placed mulch underneath, an easy to use bathroom and sink, an excellent rock for wood splitting, and the best fire pit.
We wish we'd had more time to explore the farm and just enjoy being there. Thank you and we look forward to returning!!

Teresa and Nick were absolutely wonderful host. Their place is absolutely incredible and it really was the perfect place for us to take our engagement photos. Teresa was extremely helpful and accommodating. The cabin itself is very cozy and private which we really appreciated. Overall such an amazing place. 10/10. We will definitely be back!

This was an absolute JOY. Teresa, David and the whole family are lovely. The cabin was even better than pictured and you can sense the thought and kindness in the air. If you got to this page, don't keep looking, you've found the one- book it!

My wife and I stayed here one night and wished we booked longer! Amazing setting in the perfect secluded spot away from the hustle! Teresa thought of every little detail when setting up the cabin and was awesome with communication! Bring a pole to fish the pond and apples and carrots to feed donkeys and cows ! We highly recommended and we will be back very soon!!

An absolutely lovely place to stay! All the animals are so friendly and fun to be around. Our favorite thing to do was walk around the farm to say hello to the donkeys and enjoy the wonderful views. The cabin is so thoughtfully stocked and has the best cozy vibe. We would definitely come again!!!

Wow. I don’t want to write this review because I don’t want you to know how wonderful this place is. Small, private, nestled in the most perfect little clearing filled with birds and wildlife. I’ll be back!

Don’t hesitate to book this beautiful cabin on a breathtaking property! Also, I encourage you to book for at least 2 nights. We booked for 1 night and wished we stayed for longer. Pictures don’t do the justice how beautiful and private this place is! Cabin is right next to the pond and there are trees, hills and farm animals surrounding from all sides. This is a perfect spot for relaxation and getting away from the city. Plenty to do since the property is so huge. Highly recommend!

The hosts were very kind and seem to have thought of so many details that make a stay here wonderful and inviting. The cabin was private and the walk to and from the location from parking was a short and scenic journey. They are also willing to drive people from their vehicle to the cabin when they are around. We opted to walk a few times as the weather was perfect during the time of our stay and we had traveled light.
We highly recommend this location!

We stopped in for a one-night stay just passing through Big Rapids. Our 3-year-old had an absolute blast helping feed the chickens, brush the donkeys, and playing with the barn cats and dogs. The farm is just beautiful and has something for everyone! Fishing, walking, animals, bird watching, and even a trampoline, pool, and playhouse for little ones. The board games were a nice touch since our Sprint/T-Mobile devices got no service — it was such nice family time off the grid! And if Teresa offers breakfast — take it! $25 for the three of us and we could have eaten it for lunch too: delicious loaded skillet with toast and homemade jelly (that we got to take home!). Thanks Teresa! We’ll be back!
We had a lovely stay in Teresa’s cabin. It was neat as a pin, clean, and relaxing. It had everything you could ever need. I highly recommend spending the extra $10 for breakfast!
Was very secluded and was very beautiful, had a nice relaxing stay
Amazing place to relax, even just for a night! Thank you so much for such a wonderful experience!
Had a great stay! Lovely cabin and very nice host.

Genuinely had a great time here! Felt like a part of the family for the weekend, and seeing the dogs chase the four wheeler on the way back to the cabin was a highlight for sure!
100% recommend
Wonderful place to spend the night. So peaceful and such a great setting! Teresa and David were as nice as can be. And breakfast was amazing.

Teresa's place is an absolute gem. I wish I could have stayed longer. I went on a solo trip, but this would also be amazing for a couple or a couple of friends. Their farm is so beautiful, quiet, and walkable, and I really enjoyed the fresh air, nature sounds, and animals nearby :)
Teresa was very kind, helpful, and responsive. The cabin itself and even the bathroom are totally lovely, and so much thought was put into the amenities, decoration, lighting, and the little extras. It's inspiring to see what they've created there. I would highly recommend!
Teresa was absolutely amazing just lile the last time we stayed! If your looking for a romantic getaway i would highly suggest staying here!
Wonderful cabin tucked away on their property. Feels private and secluded, but accessible. Near enough to stores and far enough from people.

This tiny cabin has everything that guests may need during their stay and those stuff make it more enjoyable. This is proof of the hostess's hospitarity.
Certainly, the hosts Teresa and David are so nice, friendly, easy to talk to, and thoughtful. They know how to welcome their guests very well.
Their cabin is beautiful and super clean. It sat peaceful in nature.
This is a good place where we could recover from the frustrations of our daily busy life. What a blessed place it is!
We'd like to go back there again. Thank you.

Booked for a quick one night getaway for my husband I and we both wish we would have booked the whole weekend. The thought that Teresa put into the cabin and hospitality are like nothing we have seen before, you can tell she truly enjoys pampering her guests! We are looking forward to booking another stay.
We had a wonderful stay at this farm cabin. The setting is gorgeous and Teresa was very welcoming to her property. We plan to return in the future.

We can not think of a better getaway for the two of us! We are already talking about coming back next year! The communication was excellent and Theresa went above and beyond to ensure that our stay was nothing less than perfect. She had the cabin fully stocked with anything we could imagine needing. Walking the property in the cool morning with a warm cup of coffee was the icing on top of an impeccable stay.

Honestly, you cannot ask for more. Teresa and David were some of the friendliest and gracious people I’ve ever met. Their little cabin is an escape, tucked into the woods on their property, but it’s SO NICE! It’s rustic, but everything was so clean and perfectly set up for maximum comfort. Like Goldilocks and the Three Bears, this place is JUST RIGHT (and not a bear in sight to boot). It’s like you stepped into a dream. The animals, from the cats to the chickens to the donkeys to the cows were all wonderful and cute and hilarious it was hard to leave. Not only that, the apple trees were dropping ripe apples while we were there, delicious fresh apples! It’s a place you don’t want to leave and a perfect spot to recharge your batteries (especially since it’s a prime location for plenty of BEAUTIFUL hiking trails through Huron/Manistee Forest). We would go back every weekend if we could!

I cannot recommend this location enough! It was my first Airbnb experience and it was a great one. The scenery is breathtaking, and Teresa made the stay fantastic. The location of the cabin was the perfect mix of privacy and closeness, with the animals/farm/main house only a short 5-minute walk away. It was the perfect getaway :)

This place was amazing! Their cat Opie stayed with us the 1st night by the fire as we stared up into the stars. Theresa & David we’re amazing people and put together an unforgettable experience. 5 stars is not enough to describe this place and this app should be ashamed to not allow us to rate this place as 6 stars instead.

Teresa and her family were so kind and helpful during our stay! She went above and beyond to make sure we enjoyed our time there. The farm itself is beautiful and well maintained and there’s so much to do! The cabin was clean and beautiful and Teresa really put so much thought into all the little details that made our stay that much better. My boys LOVED throwing sticks for the dogs and exploring the woods. We WILL be back. :)

This was everything and more that I needed for my solo retreat!
Teresa went above and beyond. The cabin was super cute and comfortable, the view was amazing, lots of beautiful nature, but super close to Big Rapids if you need anything.
Option of an amazing breakfast for $10 delivered to your door, both were enough for breakfast and lunch!
I hope to come back either alone or with my family!

Very peaceful and serene! We opted for the farm fresh breakfast both mornings and were not disappointed! Teresa is a great host and a wonderful chef. Her husband Dave was very nice as well. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay
Everything was amazing. Cute cabin that feels isolated and remote, but is only a short walk to my car. Teresa was a great host.
This property was absolutely beautiful. The cabin was clean, cute and cozy! We loved a the cute touches! Teresa was a great host!

Great place! This was the best Airbnb my wife and I have stayed at. The hosts were very friendly and welcoming while the cabin itself was quant, perfectly located near a pond and the farm yet secluded for privacy. We couldn’t ask for anything to be different and will definitely be returning soon!

Charming cabin on a beautiful family farm!!! Everything was impeccable… rustic, peaceful with all the comforts of home! Especially enjoyed the animals and the fresh farm breakfast! Highly recommend and we will be back!

What an amazing gem to have stumbled upon! We had an absolute amazing stay, and actually enjoyed the simplicity of no electricity or wifi, (but with a jackery power station to keep our phones charged, and power a sound machine for help the kids is to sleep).
Teresa is super friendly and quick to communicate back.
We were welcomed to visit farm animals, and the kids helped collect chicken eggs and feed snacks to the animals. The kittens were the kids favorite!
The biggest thing that could have improved our stay was just having our things better organized and only having the minimal things, we had way too many things way under organized (we were in the middle of a move).
There was something for the whole family, my husband and son loved having a fire, all the kids loved the loft and seeing the farm animals and wildlife, I loved the quiet and bird watching, and we all loved going for walks.
The location is out in the country, but with a aldi and meijer 10 mins away! This is a place we would love to come back to! Thanks so much for having us!

We had a wonderful family weekend. We came to town for my son’s graduation from Ferris State University. Both sets of grandparents were able to come and were completely comfortable. It was a wonderful family weekend. We sat at the table together. We stood around the island in the kitchen visiting and watched movies in the living room together. We sat and visited on the deck, listening to some good stories. We could not have been happier!!!! Precious memories were created, and I am very grateful to have had this place for the weekend.
Crystal was an amazing host, very responsive and accommodating. Thanks for a great experience.

Beautiful place. Had everything that we could have needed and more. Crystal was kind and considerate. She was available if we had any questions or needed anything. The instructions for getting there and into the house were great. She had information about extras that we could use like kayaks, fishing, etc. so we felt right at home. Our granddaughters enjoyed every bit of our stay. Plenty of room for everyone and the kitchen table was large and could accommodate all of our family. Will definitely stay here when we return to Big Rapids.
This was a beautiful space inside and out. The private lake was quiet and relaxing.

Our group had an amazing time at Hillside Hideaway. The house is beautifully decorated, the kitchen fully stocked, and includes a wonderful view. Sarah and Frederico were very helpful and gave detailed check-in instructions that made our arrival stress-free. Make sure to stop at Meijer to grab water for drinking as they suggest! Overall, we are very happy with our choice to stay here and will certainly come back if the opportunity arises!
Excellent Spring vacation spot with our family of 6. Beautiful Lakefront location. Really enjoyed the Hot Tub, Outdoor Fire pit and Kayaks ❣️ We'll be back😁

Lovely property and house. Very peaceful lake, comfortable furniture, and cozy home.
The tap water is very sulphuric, which was our only complaint. It was hard to shower with and the fridge filter was not strong enough to make it very potable. It still had a yellow color and slightly sulphuric odor. I’d highly recommend bringing in bottled water and this should be more communicated by the management company.

An absolute gem tucked quietly away by the lake. This place serves as a perfect retreat from the loud city life and has a certain essence that just makes it feel so “homey”. I was here with my girlfriend and dog, but there was so much more room (including lots to do for children such as an outdoor play house and a little section upstairs in the cabin. Truly a blissful experience in Michigan.

We were a group of church ladies visiting for a weekend getaway. Within an hour of being at the Hillside, there was a unanimous vote to visit again soon! The cabin was comfortable, spacious, inviting and relaxing. We found everything we needed and enjoyed sunrises and evening campfires overlooking the pristine lake.
Pros:
-The view is gorgeous!
-The coffee and drink stations were super fun and useful for a group.
-The fixtures and décor were fun to look at and well thought out.
-We loved how cozy the gas stove made the first floor feel!
-Communication from the host was excellent, friendly and timely.
-The location is almost completely surrounded by nature.
Cons:
-If you visit with a group of adults, the single beds on the 2nd floor are manageable, but don’t afford a lot of overhead space. They are fine for kids.
-If you use the driveway to unload (instead of taking the stairs) it is VERY steep and can be daunting for some drivers. It was not a deal breaker for our group

We can't wait to come back! The host was very responsive and even when we ran into trouble with the stove it was quickly and easily solved! any time I had a question or suggestion I don't think I ever had to wait for a response for more than a few minutes. The location is a little confusing at first (we didn't realize it was down the hill from the parking) but I wouldn't consider it a difficult place to find. Overall my party of 7 of us were all very impressed and loved the general atmosphere. Not to mention how conveniently close it was to food and groceries as we had to make a few trips for extra things during our stay. All in all, a wonderful and peaceful getaway!

Our stay was amazing! Everything was as it looked and was described online. The home was clean and ready for our party of 10. Very spacious and easily accommodated our group. The kids loved the upstairs and room with the two beds. Gave the kids some privacy from the adults.
The campfire and view from the hot tub are breathtaking. The hot tub was awesome and a highlight for kids and adults alike.
Our host was prompt in response times when we asked questions.
We would highly recommend this home to anyone with a love for outdoors and wants a getaway! We have a fabulous time!!!!

Hillside Hideaway was picture perfect. It was beautifully decorated, very clean and fully furnished! I loved all the extras that the hideaway offered. One of my favorite extras was the fur baby items - tie out, dishes and doggy bags! So thoughtful. I also loved that there were plenty of linens.
The house offered lots of games to play! Our kids were big fans of the “kids camp” area and outdoor slide. Such a great use of space.
We can’t wait to go back! Sarah did such a great job making it feel like home. 💗
Very clean, very comfortable, and would absolutely stay again.

We had a lovely short stay in big rapids & this place was perfect for us and our pups!
Hosts responded quickly & location was beautiful.
Hot tub does not get super hot but would still book again!
5 beam
The owners were always willing to help us if we reached out, the house was beautiful, and well equipped will anything you’d need.

We came for an end of winter getaway, and what a perfect getaway it was! The home is beautiful, spacious, thoughtfully designed and curated, and very cozy! The view of the lake, and the hot tub under the beautiful stars was wonderful. We very much enjoyed how peaceful it was, and enjoyed going for scenic walks. Thank you for sharing your home and providing the perfect end of winter getaway for us! We hope to visit again in the future!
Our friend group had a great, relaxing stay. We were also lucky enough to hear "singing ice" on the lake, as the conditions were perfect. We would definitely stay again.

Hillside Hideaway was beautiful! My group and I felt welcomed & made lots of great memories in the space. Communication was spectacular, very thorough and proactive. They were extremely patient and accommodating when we were having vehicle troubles upon leaving!
Beautiful place, very quiet area and peaceful. Hosts were very friendly and responsive.

Every year, for the last five years, my sister and I do a birthday trip weekend, where we go out of town and kind of do whatever we want to. A little escape from reality for the weekend. We get an Airbnb and get our family and friends together that we haven’t seen that live all over and we chill and watch movies, eat snacks and good food, play cards and just enjoy each others company. Nothing crazy. And this was by far the best agreed upon, within our usual group that comes, Airbnb rental that we’ve stayed at. Thank you so much for being so responsive and helpful and your home was absolutely beautiful. We for sure hope to be back!
Great host, great place, 2 thumbs up!

Cozy woodland retreat. Best pillows we have ever had at an air bnb!!
Would be an excellent spot for large family gatherings. Just a short drive into Big Rapids.
Beautiful home and very comfortable, we hope to stay again in the future.
My family and pup enjoyed our stay at Sarah's. We loved the setting and the house was cozy for our group. Thank you for having us!

Our family had the most amazing Christmas here. We are a large family and was able to have all of are children and the grand kids there together with plenty of room for everyone. The kids just love the upstairs and the slide outside and all of us spent the evenings in the hot tub relaxing. Our host Sarah and her husband had a beautiful Christmas tree in the livingroom and the house was so lovely. We are already talking of are next trip we take here this coming summer. This home is a must for a great time spent with your family.
Amazing views and nature. Winter wonderland!

I got some (unexpected) free days at work and spending them at Sarah’s house was the best way to do it. The hot tub and fire pit were my favs with that lake view. Beautiful location, perfect if you wanna take a break from the city chaos. I’ll definitely be coming back in the summer and bringing my nephews since there was this lil playground perfect for them.
Sarah and Federico were responsive and friendly. Willing to help at all times. Thanks!!

Just a quick notes for those not familiar with the area. it's rather steep when you get down to their walk away down to the home, just a heads up and something to be aware of. also bring bottled water if you don't like hard water. they have a water softener but after fridge filter but it's still strong after not having it for a while.
other than that, great stay, great hosts, would recommend

We had a great time at Sarah's place. It was 4 adults and 2 kids, and we could have easily fit more. The view of the lake is beautiful and peaceful, without a million houses surrounding the lake. We went in the off-season and really enjoyed the hot tub, all the board games, the gas fireplace, and the grill. My nephews learned how to play checkers and how to use a wafflemaker - lots of fun for them. We are discussing a return trip in the summer when we could enjoy time on the lake :)

Wonderful stay. Beautiful home and hosts were super helpful! Even offered to arrange local support when my car died day of checkout. We had a wonderful time. Welcome tray of cookies, cider, and a candle was very sweet!
It was perfect!

Great location to get a view of the leaves changing for autumn. The home had a clean smell once we opened the door. Kitchen was fully stocked. There was a bar area with more than enough glasses, a coffee station also stocked. My family was able to enjoy the kayaks, jacuzzi and other amenities on the property which made for a great stay. I really appreciated how the home was decorated and seemed to have everything one would need on vacation.
We enjoyed our trip to the hillside hideaway! The fall colors were brilliant!! The area was quite and the hot tub was perfect!!

BOOK NOW! Our stay at Hillside Hideaway was AMAZING!!! When we pulled up, the warm cafe lights welcomed us and let us know we were in the right place! Clean, better than the pictures and there were beautiful fresh flowers on the table. The house was designed beautifully and we loved all the little details like beautiful lamps, tons of towels, a variety of games, the coffee bar that included a French press in addition to a regular coffee pot and even the nightlights in the bathrooms were cute! The kitchen was well stocked with everything we needed to cook meals for our family. We loved relaxing, staring at the lake, making s’mores by the bonfire, chilling in the hot tub and kayaking was the best! Sarah was a great host with excellent communication before, during and after our stay! Stop in Big Rapids at Meijer to load up on groceries because you won’t want to leave once you check in! We can’t wait to stay here again. Thanks Sarah!!!

100/10 stay. A beautiful lakeside house with a hot tub and perfect views. Everything in the house was cozy and comfortable, definitely not your ordinary Airbnb. Outlets everywhere, decor was thoughtfully executed and made us feel at home immediately. After the weather decided to not cooperate, the living room was the perfect place for us to get married by the bay windows overlooking the lake. Already thinking about booking for our anniversary next year. Owners are very responsive and hospitable, Sarah and Ethan thank you so much again for the card, champagne, and flowers. A delightful touch to an already special weekend.
Everything was as described. The home was lovely! Cleverly designed and decorated. Responded immediately to questions.

This home was just what my family and I needed for a fall break. The house was very clean and as pictured. We brought all of our food for the weekend. I was able to cook all of our meals with no problem as the kitchen was fully stocked. There's even a waffle maker, which is not something we have at home, so my family was thrilled to have waffles. All the beds were comfortable. My 2 younger kids loved sleeping in the "Kids Camp" upstairs. There was plenty of space for my family of 5 to relax. The outdoor area was something out of an autumn calendar. At one point we were in the hot tub and it was raining multi colored fall leaves all around us. It was beautiful! The option to rent the boat is wonderful! We made some great memories taking the boat out to try fishing. We brought our dog. The property is dog friendly and there were 2 leads so we were able to let the dog out often. Sarah is super friendly and quick to respond to any questions I had. I would recommend highly this house!

Truly amazing place, would definitely stay again! Sarah and Frederico were super accommodating and responsive when we needed something. The place is super private, well stocked, very well appointed (one of the best interiors I’ve seen in the Michigan area) and there were so many things to do! 5-stars all the way.

This was absolutely exactly what we wanted and it’s was beautiful. We absolutely lived your home and enjoyed ourselves. We are talking about making it a tradition if the house is available next year etc. thank you

My husband and I had a wonderful time relaxing here for our babymoon. The house is beautifully decorated and we loved the attention to detail. We rented the pontoon and took the kayaks out and were the only people on the water everyday! The Fall colors are gorgeous right now around the property. Sarah was always quick to respond to any questions we had. Thank you for the peaceful getaway!

What an amazing place to stay and such an awesome host!! Great at maintaining communication even before the rental was purchased! The cabin was fully equipped with everything we needed and more. The cabin was even more beautiful and relaxing than anticipated! Would definitely recommend getting the pontoon as well!! Thank you so much for sharing this blissful space ☺️
Sarah's was clean, updated and a beautiful place to stay. Nice Kitchen and excellent beds.

The Hillside Hideaway home overdelivered! The home was spacious and cozy. The furniture was new and comfortable. The owners have done a great job reflecting vacation in Michigan as the rooms are decorated with all things we do here during the different seasons. There was fun for everyone and beautiful views! Looking over the lake and wooded undeveloped land across the lake reminded me of something you would find in a Hallmark movie. Our family made beautiful memories and can’t wait to go back!
Lovely home! Enjoyed the winding back roads and beautiful view. Access to the indoor and outdoor games, hot tub, pontoon, and kayaks made this stay even more fun! Very clean and responsive host.

Sarah was a great host and there when we needed her to explain things.
We really appreciated how thoughtful everything was. From the leads for the dogs in the back, strategically placed throughout, to the stocked pantry so we weren't running to the store for extras. We had a great stay and loved the amenities.
Amazing home and excellent host.

Our group was 2 families of 4 and 1 adult and this place worked perfect! They utilized every inch of the house perfectly and the amenities they provided were impressive! They provide all soaps/ample beach towels/games and toys/coffee.. the list goes on!
I would recommend renting the pontoon as the house sits on a cove and isn’t very swimmable (at least for my crew) in front of the house. There is also a campground beach that is $1 a person right down the road that was great!
Great little weekend getaway! Everything was just as promised. It was awesome that our dog was welcome.
Amazing view and very comfortable inside. Tiny shower space. Host had great communication, fast and friendly. I highly recommend!

A nice getaway with a pretty view of the river and surrounded by trees. The home is small but perfect for two people. Comfortable beds! Big plus that it was pet friendly, dogs enjoyed being able to tag along and the area had some nice walking trails nearby. Home is cozy. Easy to use the temperature controls and had no issues with warming the place up during cold weather.
Only thing to mention is that the river is not “usable”. The dock sits up high with some steep stairs down. There are a lot of trees and things that obstruct any fishing. Still a beautiful and peaceful place, but just a heads up for someone looking for water to dip toes into or do any fishing.
Hosts were very responsive and accommodating, a wonderful get away for some peace and quiet. Would definitely come back.
Quiet, riverside house. Great for a couple, two couples traveling together, or a small family. Very quiet. 10-15 minutes to Big Rapids with all needed amenities. Friendly neighbors.
Very responsive and welcoming hosts, we would stay here again
Great little place on the river. Very clean and easy to find. I had no issues and would stay there again. The host was amazing and it was a great stay.

We really loved this place. It was a perfect getaway for the holiday & we plan on even coming back for just a weekend stay. The house was updated & comfy, the view while watching a movie was beautiful and the area/neighborhood was enjoyable as well
Super cute place for a quick stay! Nice for a private get away where you want to stay at the cabin and play games.
No major complaints whatsoever. As described and very nice place.
Wonderful, peaceful, and very relaxing. Easy to find and had lots of great places to shop close by.

We loved our stay in Big Rapids, it was the perfect peaceful weekend that we were looking for. Lots of hiking within close driving distance, beautiful back porch. We loved drinking coffee and down by the river in the morning. One thing to note is that there is no central heat, it’s a wall unit so bring some extra layers in the fall and winter!
Beautiful area and peaceful we loved our stay. Our host was really great at communicating and helpful! Definitely recommend.
This place was the perfect, quiet getaway for the weekend. Just as described and worth the price!!
We enjoyed our weekend on the river! Nice cabin with all the amenities.

Overall we had a positive experience. The house has a nice layout and was comfortable. There were all basics that we needed to cook as well as towels/extra sheets. The bathroom could use a bit of an update but was certainly functional. This wasn’t a deal breaker for us but be aware the outside is a bit sandy so coming in and out can track some unwanted dirt in. There is a nice view at the bottom of the river. A couple trees could be removed to open the view up a smidge but it was a relaxing time to sit at the bottom. There isn’t any swimming at this property but there is a nice river access point about a mile over that we spent some time at and enjoyed.
Was exactly what we wanted. A quiet place for a relaxing weekend outdoors. The river was beautiful and our dogs had a great time. Would stay again.
What a quiet, cozy little river cottage in the big woods of Big Rapids!
Amazing experience. Exactly what we were looking for!

This place was exactly what my partner and I needed for a weekend away. One of my favorite things was that we could bring our senior dogs with us and didn'thave to find a babysitter. The view was great, and the inside of the place was made to feel like home. We will for sure be staying here again when we get the chance.
a beautiful cabin on the river. great communication. would definitely recommend!

We were attending our daughter’s graduation at Ferris State University. The cabin is located off the beaten path from the campus, but it was a very short drive to everything we needed to get to for graduation and parties.
The cabin is in a peaceful location and looked just like the photos. The beds we’re comfortable and the cabin was cozy, clean and cheerful. The smell of pine trees in the woods, watching many turtles and blue herons and the full moon reflecting on the river were enjoyable and peaceful.
Very nice place with peaceful surroundings.

Perfect place to stay. Close to the University but far enough to feel away from the college craziness.
My son plays football there so we spend a lot of time in the area. We will be back to this property.
Beautiful accommodations and gorgeous scenery. Thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The bed was super comfortable! Would stay again and again!!

Up north weekend cottage that your grandpa bought in the 1950's with his salary from GM. If you grew up in Michigan, you know. The cottage was very clean and comfortable. Kitchen was small but clean with everything I needed to cook for myself. There's a separate heater (controller pad by door to deck) and an EU style wall A/C with a remote (these cottages were not built with A/C ). The bedrooms are petite but the beds are soft, not too soft, making for a good nights sleep. W/D work great. Plenty of parking. Fast WiFi. Nice TV with lots of good options plus you're able to sign into all your streaming account. Check out chores are reasonable - strip the bed, put your dishes in the dishwasher and run it, make sure grill is turned off, and lock up. My only caveat - very specific and won't apply to 99% of you - is my husband didn't fit in the shower. He is 6'5 and, literally, a linebacker. I fit just fine.
Cottage is great up to 4 people. Nice river side decks. Quiet and safe.
We enjoyed the place very much! The location was close enough to town while still feeling like we were off the beaten path. Perfect for our family!
Great view and location
This was a perfect place to spend the evening. the view of the river is beautiful and the home was cozy. I would highly recommend this place!
Willing to go above and beyond

Beautiful, quiet location for a cute little cabin with everything we needed. The river view is stunning and the cabin was clean and spacious with a well equipped kitchen. Friendly and communicative host.
Cozy, romantic, perfect! Will return soon
Michael’s place was great, very responsive and cared about my experience.
Amazing place to stay! We will be staying again!

Before checking in, I received a message that we would need to provide our own towels. I looked through both the Airbnb listing and rental contract and this was never mentioned.
When we checked in the cabin was set to 62 degrees so we turned it up to 68. The cabin remained very cold the entire time that we stayed besides one bedroom that was super hot.
Upon checking in there were many rules listed on the fridge for checking out. These rules are not posted on Airbnb or in the separate rental contract that is required to sign. The rules state that you must take the garbage to the end of the very long driveway, strip all bedding and towels (which is funny bc they said byo towels) and place by washer and put all dishes in the dishwasher. This was quite surprising and honestly ridiculous seeing how I paid $120 cleaning fee. It’s wild to require guests to practically clean the entire place when they are being charged a large cleaning fee.
Overall we will not stay here again.
Clean, comfortable, great loacation and amazing view.

We really enjoyed our stay. My son is a student at Ferris State University and we came out for parents weekend. The house and location were ideal.
The view of the river and the fall colors were incredible. This property is clean, updated and less than 10 minutes from campus and downtown Big Rapids.
We look forward to staying again. This property will likely be our go when visiting BR moving forward.
Relaxing River was a great place! It was very clean, the communication with the host was prompt, the location is SUPERB especially to catch the fall colors in Michigan!

Overall the cabin was ok. The location was great...it was a short drive to the downtown area and amenities while still feeling far away and having privacy. The river deck was small but nice and I imagine it would be really awesome in the summer. The cabin itself is no frills but true to the pictures. My biggest complaint is they do not provide towels and I was sent a "reminder" of this two days into our trip so I went back and looked at the booking info and the contract they had me sign and there was no mention of this, so not sure how it was a reminder. Since we already left, we had to stop and buy towels and wash them before we could shower on the evening we got there. Very inconvenient and an additional cost for us. I don't think I would stay here again.
The view of the river was gorgeous and we really enjoyed our stay!
Wonderful place and the hosts made everything very easy. I highly recommend!

This cabin and property was just wonderful. The cabin was equipped for almost everything you would need for your stay. The cabin was very clean and decorated nicely. The view from the picture window over looking the river was beautiful. Unfortunately, it rained for most of our stay, so we did not get a chance to utilize the gas grill and furnished deck. For those staying in the future, I would recommend brining your own pillows and extra cuddle blankets.
We had a nice weekend at this cabin, very quiet and relaxing.
Cute cottage easy check in and out
Very quiet beautiful location. Comfortable cottage
We had a great time at Micheal’s place. It’s cute, cozy and comfortable. Nestled between the trees, very private. Would love to visit again.

We really enjoyed our stay! Cabin was perfect! View of river was great from upper and lower deck. Very relaxing and quiet. Neighbors were very nice also as they brought over some wood so we could have a great campfire. Communication was also great throughout our stay. Would definitely stay again if we are in the area. Thank you for a very enjoyable weekend.

The cabin is adorable and looks exactly like shown in the pictures. The location is great, there are neighbors on both sides but not too close for comfort. (They were also very friendly! :)) The hosts were helpful and fairly responsive. The only thing that seemed strange is the requested cleaning. There was a posted list of what to do before checkout, such as stripping used bedding, taking out the trash, and loading the dishwasher. (All of which we did). However we had already paid the cleaning fee, so it felt odd to have to do these things. Check out time for the rental is 10 am, and check in is 4 pm. I feel this is more than enough time for the cabin to be cleaned before the next people arrive. Common courtesy when checking out is one thing, but having to follow a list of cleaning tasks is another, especially when a cleaning fee has already been paid. However, this is just my personal opinion and is a minor detail in the overall picture. We still had a wonderful time, and thought the place and location were great.

Great place and great location. Pretty secluded and not a lot of traffic on the river. My family really enjoyed the stay and as a first timer Airbnb, Michael and his team had the answers before I could ask the question. Very informative and helpful.

We very much loved our stay. The place is tucked into the woods which was both beautiful and made it feel very private. Definitely would recommend staying here. The hosts were super helpful and so quick to respond to any questions or needs. 10/10 would stay again.
Quiet, relaxing, comfy beds
Great stay, great location. Would stay again
Quiet, relaxing, convenient to Big Rapids, golf, and fishing…. it was exactly what we were looking for! Thank you so much and perhaps we’ll be back in the area in the future. Jim and Darcy
Cute place. Quiet, secluded and a great view. Loved it

We had a wonderful, relaxing weekend! My favorite was enjoying my coffee on the lower deck every morning as the sun glistened on the water and hanging in my hammock over the water in the late afternoons watching boaters pass by and listening to the sounds of nature! Our two dogs had a blast exploring around the cabin and we took them swimming nearby where there was river access, they’ll surely sleep for days! We got some awesome photos of the property and views, even a couple to use for our pregnancy announcement which we shared during our stay! Everything was clean and as described… simple and all the basics included! Would stay again and would recommend!
Everything about this cabin was exactly as was expected. The locations is very quite and feels secluded. The view of the river was wonderful. We would definitely stay again!

My daughter and I enjoyed our stay. Just to be aware, you do need to bring your own towels, but it was very convenient to have the option to do laundry while we were there as it was the last place we stayed on our vacation. The cabin was very clean and the view was beautiful!
Beautiful location, great deck, quite a few steps to go down to get to river. Small closets.
The best little weekend getaway you could ask for. So cozy and quiet. 💙

Super cute little house, was very clean and had great communication with the hosts. Neighbors are a lot closer than you’d expect. But it’s still a great location with a great view. I’d definitely stay here again.
Lovely view of the river! Even got to watch otters play and turtles sunbathe. The listing/pictures are accurate and communication was great.

River shack in a poor run down area. Went to walk my dog and was chased by the neighbors dog they were just letting run free unsupervised. Area has only one attraction, the river. Bring your own towels since the owner is too cheap to supply them. 99 dollar cleaning fee, yet they want you to do dishes, laundry, and trash before you check out. I could go on and on, overall bad experience I wouldn't recommend
Nice place, stayed here 2 nights. Very clean
amazing spot, great hosts!
Great place with beautiful views! A little closer to neighbors then expected, but the overall experience was amazing!
Very relaxing little getaway!
Cute cabin! Great views of the river. We would definitely come back! Thank you!
Cute place, quiet, and has everything you need. Would come back in the future!

Split the spot with 2 friends, overall pretty affordable spot, beautiful view, super clean and comfortable sleeping even in the living room area. Appreciated the dishwasher, there was plenty of pots and pans for cooking, bring your own spices if you're trying to cook, towels and laundry detergent were also available there. Definitely recommend!
Provided clear and quick responses and a very clean space.

My boyfriend and I are workaholics and have 5 kids between us both. So I wanted to find a place small and cute for 2 for our 6 year anniversary. I found this Beautiful, very quite place right on the River with an awesome over view of the river. With the big widows facing the river, we had the most beautiful sun rises every morning. I don’t think we couldn’t of found a better place in our price range to go and have a nice quite anniversary weekend together to get away from it all. Thank you so much for sharing your wonder place!!
Stunning view of the river, comfy bed, and a great overall atmosphere!

My boyfriend and I needed a little get away! I found this place and it was so nice and relaxing. The cost was a steal! My dogs came with us and they had a blast in the snow! It was very convenient to go into town about 11 mins away and find a restaurant. There is a gas station about 4 minutes away that has a liquor store/ mini grocery store in it. It was snowing but the roads were kept up and felt safe. I had a few questions during our stay and the host was prompt with a response. There are 3 hosts and I spoke with Kim. She was very pleasant and helpful. There’s a large bay window in the front room which was facing the lake and back patio. It was a beautiful view. The place was simple and clean. The shower was small but plenty of hot water and great water pressure! I recommend bringing pillows if you have a certain preference. They were way to soft for me. There are hiking areas about 12 mins away. I believe there was 3-4 areas. The host recommended Raven Brewing and BBQ. We chose Schuberg Bar and Grill. Children can eat there. They make several kinds of burgers! A place called Bernie’s was near. They have donuts and smoothies! Our poor dogs were outside playing in the snow and started whimpering and holding up their paws because they were so cold! We took a quick trip over to Family farm and home and they had dog boots. They were able to enjoy being outside longer with those on. We are talking about coming back either in the summer or the fall so that we can enjoy the dock for fishing! I highly recommend staying here!

Great place to get away for peace and quiet. Hosts communicated excellently and the expectations for checking out were very clear. If you do book this cabin in the winter, be careful of the hill that leads up to the house. If your car is not 4 wheel drive you might have some trouble, but it is still manageable.

you’ll be so sorry if you don’t stay here….
honestly we ended up here by accident, never been to the area before but we saw this place and the photos were so pretty so we booked it.
BEST IDEA EVER.
great private road,
cool stairs to the river (totally doable even in the snow!)
super super nice inside, clean and modern. had salt and pepper- oil. coffee, paper towels the whole shabang.
great check in, the host him really made the whole stay better with her awesome communication.
we will definitely be back one day,
thanks for the great christmas vacation.
Great and updated cozy cabin, beautiful views. Neighbors are close by, but a very tranquil stay.
Cute, cozy, great view and location! Fantastic communication with hosts. Will definitely be back!

Great choice, the house is very clean when we arrived. Our host were very accommodating. The view overlooking the river is amazing. There are some nice trails nearby and 2 breweries nearby both great locations.
Great place for a getaway. Great location on the beautiful river!

We loved our little family getaway here and would absolutely stay here again! The views of the river from the decks are BEAUTIFUL! There is only one neighbor nearby, but it still feels very secluded. The kitchen was fully stocked with all the essentials. The bathroom was clean, but you need to bring your own towels. The shower was a bit small as someone reviewed earlier, but works completely fine and plenty of hot water. The beds are comfy and warm. Overall the place was clean and tidy.
Only Con: We understand this place allows pets, but the couch and pillows had a wet dog smell. Everything else was perfectly clean and odor free!
It was perfect for a small family getaway and it was driving distance to several places, trails, and activities in the Big Rapids area! We would definitely stay here again!

I enjoy and look forward to staying with "Symple Lyfe". This is my second or third stay, I believe in consistency and have not been disappointed. Check for yourself and I am sure you will enjoy your stay.

Michael undercharges for this place. It is more beautiful than the pictures are able to show. I had an awesome time with my brother staying there. There are no restrictions on indoor climate (although I never changed it (but this has been an issue at other places). Everything included in the amenities is there and actually works well. He made it clear he was available if I needed anything. It is mostly very secluded. You can see into the yard of the closest neighbors when you use the firepit (and vice versa). They were cool, and we were able to watch a movie outdoors on a projector. I would and hope to come back.

This is a great find if you’re looking for a relaxing stay! The place is newly remodeled (at the time of this review) and everything in this place is brand new. Very clean, amenities were great, and the view was beautiful. My only complaints were that the mattress we slept on was very firm, and my husband had a hard time fitting in the shower (he’s 6’2” and over 200 lbs). The shower is about the size of one you’d find in a camper or RV. Aside from that, this space was perfect for a weekend getaway. Very quiet and peaceful. And the hosts were super helpful! They let us know everything we needed, and checking in and out was a breeze.
Decor is simple , clean and pleasant. Worked as a great base for us to visit friends and family.

What a great place to relax. Beautiful view and plenty of privacy. Relax on the deck while enjoying nature. The cottage is clean and decorated so cute. Loved being able to bring my dog. Big Rapids has some great hiking trails not far from this cottage. I would definitely recommend.
the place is absolutely amazing. right on the water!
great place! very friendly neighbors and the area was right near the boat ramp...perfect
A great house in a great area. Lots of room to hang out and relax.
10/10 Recommend this home or any home from Michael. Stayed for a month Everything was great was very helpful and very responsive when something was needed before and during the stay! Thank y’all! 🫶🏽

We’ll be back! Loved the place! Big with a cozy feel.
SUPER comfortable foam beds.
Beautiful woodwork and windows.
Clean!! (Only thing we found was some spillage in the oven, noticed a burnt smell once we stared cooking, but we handled it and it didn’t hinder our stay a bit!) bathrooms, beds and kitchen were spotless. Super responsive and let us check in early.
Took a hike on the river walk and strolled around town, walkable to much of downtown!
We wonder about the rich house history, and previous old time owners. Built in 1880 we think it has some stories to tell!

We had a wonderful weekend with friends. Everyone had their own bedroom and the common areas were very spacious. Loved being able to walk to some shops and restaurants. Very clean and loved seeing all the old woodwork. We will stay again soon.
This location and home worked perfect for us!

As always, nice stay.
