This Airbnb exceeded my expectations in every way. The cleanliness was impeccable, and the mattress was comfortable. The self-check-in was straightforward, and I can't wait to return and stay here during my future trips.
Very clean and enjoyable, really no complaints except for the fact that hot water is foreign but other than that the stay was near perfect. Would definitely stay here again.
we had a great time! The place was great and bob and his team were great work with.
We had an absolutely wonderful time at the Grass Lake Lodge. Couldnt recommend it enough. Cant wait to go back!
My guests and I had a fabulous stay and are already planning to come back!

This lodge and property are heavenly! PERFECT. We had a blast. Every amenity and little touch was accounted for and then some. We hiked all of the trails and they were super wide and cleared out. The lake is stunning! We played games, sat around the fire, hot tubbed, it was an AMAZING weekend and we cannot thank Bob and his team enough. It was one of our favorite USMC reunions and we will definitely be back.

The host goes above and way beyond to accommodate any needs. The lodge is so beautiful and perfect for our large family. We love the outdoors and this is the perfect place for our crew that ranges from age 2 to 67. 5 star accommodations!

We greatly enjoyed our return visit to the beautiful Grass Lake Lodge. This home and property is second to none - peaceful, private, plenty of activities, outdoor fun, lake, hiking trails, and all the upgraded amenities you could want. We love to visit this Michigan paradise, and we look forward to another stay soon. The hosts are very friendly, helpful, and easy to work with - always going the extra mile to make us feel at home. I highly recommend this property, host, and experience. You will be glad you did!

This place is beautiful and has many great amenities. The place was super clean and even smelled good upon entry. The home is gorgeous, very well designed and furnished. The kitchen is huge and very well equipped. The bedrooms are huge, have great views and the beds very comfortable. The fireplace is easy, warm and beautiful. Lighting is plentiful and well-marked. The bathrooms are very nice, one has a spa tub even heated floors. The hot tub is amazing and was very clean. There are several decks and balconies, a screened in porch even an outside bar which is so cool. Our boys work for a major builder and were very impressed with the construction. Despite the uncooperative weather we did use the boat and fished some. We chose to relax and just get away from it all, the place is very quiet. The communications from owner Bob and caretaker Sabrina were amazing, they made it so easy, we felt like we knew them. Summer here with the lake, beach, boat, firepits and horseshoes would be amazing!

Robert and his team are very communicative and make the process easy with plenty of available features and customization for your trip! Check in was easy and they were quick to respond with any questions or help. Also, this place is even better than the pictures and great for large groups!
Great location and very clean place! We enjoying this stay very much. Thank you Bob!
Our family enjoyed our stay here abundantly! We highly recommend this beautiful get away!
This place is beautiful. We had a large group this didn’t want to leave. Private lake, hot tub, plenty of space, beautiful interior, plenty of space, what else do you need?

We enjoy our weekend gateway at “Grass Lake Lodge”. It exceeded our expectations. The property is so beautiful! Even more beautiful in person. Bob was so kind and communication was fantastic. We felt very at home. We were sad to leave but we return home relaxed and refreshed. We plan to return again! We definitely recommend staying here, you won’t regret it.

Great property! Had an awesome time! House was in great shape with lots to do in the house and around the lake. Everything was clean and ready to go when we got there and I was in contact with the owners and the local crew if we needed anything at all. 10/10.
The space was amazing! tons to do just on the property. Very fun

We stayed in this home last week for our family vacation. We had 6 adults and 2 babies. The house was just perfect! During the day, we kayaked, fished from both the dock and the boat and paddleboarded. The lake was beautiful, private and calm. Since there was no wake from other boats, the babies could wade in the water without getting knocked down. The sand on the beach was pristine and we spent hrs building sand castles. We also took advantage of walking/jogging on the trails through the woods. There was never a lack of things to do in the evenings as this home had everything.. games, pool, shuffleboard etc... And the view from the porch while eating dinner is just beautiful. We even splurged and had dinner brought in 1 night from Blue Cow. I would highly recommend this home if you are looking for a quiet, relaxing and beautiful vacation. Oh... Robert and his caretakers are fantastic to work with and VERY responsive.

A phenomenal getaway place for the whole family or a group of friends. Everything was well maintained with the grounds and lodge. We added the Carriage House and that allowed the family with babies to have a private space for naps, etc.
The kitchen, bedrooms, extras were all wonderful and we can’t wait to come back!
Grass Lake Lodge was awesome!! Perfect secluded nature getaway.

We had an AMAZING stay at Robert’s home. It’s a truly wonderful property that was exactly what we were looking for and would highly recommend to anyone. Our group took advantage of the great fishing, fire pits, game room, and the ample amount of space that Robert’s home provides. Robert is also a fantastic communicator and made us feel right at home from start to finish. Can’t wait to come back!!
Great place, so much to do!
Amazing space with lots of amenities and beautiful surroundings. Fishing, relaxing, games, this place has it all. Host was outstanding with communication. Would highly recommend.

What a great place!!! It was neat to visit Ferris State where I have my degree from!!! Love those Bulldogs!!! The house is so peaceful and private, the basement was our favorite place because of all the great games like pool, shuffleboard, and ping pong plus they had horseshoes outside and the brand new hot tub was the icing on the cake!!! Can’t wait to stay again!!!
Our family enjoyed the lodge! It was beautiful and had many things to do. My brother-in-law even caught a fish!

The lodge was absolutely gorgeous and spacious. The hiking trails were amazing and we had a lot of fun in the game room. Beds were comfortable and bathrooms were very clean. Kitchen had ample space and a six burner stove plus all necessary supplies. The lake is gorgeous and the location is very peaceful. Everything was immaculate and the owner is great to work with. We cannot wait to go back!

This property is absolutely amazing! We loved the peaceful and private surroundings, the beautiful home, the game room and hot tub were perfect, enjoyed the trails in the woods, and the hosts made us feel right at home. Robert and the home hosts are exceedingly friendly, helpful, and generous in their hospitality. This is a spectacular property, and one we hope to visit again! Thank you for a memorable sanctuary getaway!
Beautiful home in a beautiful setting. Great hiking on the property. We loved the lower level rec room and the games. Kitchen is large and excellent for cooking family meals.
Everything was fantastic!!
We had an amazing stay. There was plenty of space for everyone and the house was comfortable and super clean. Beautiful property we would love to come back to!

We had an amazing time at our stay at Grass Lake Lodge. Wonderful communication by both the owner and the caretakers. It was such a relaxing weekend for us four couples. The house was clean, the view towards the water is amazing - especially in the morning; and the house is even better than the pictures show! It’s a huge house and very clean. Thank you!

Outstanding ! We had a great time. GLL is the perfect place for a family gathering. We had a 5 star experience from booking to our departure.
You will not want to leave this spectacular home.

This house was unreal for a family tailgate weekend. It’s less than 10 mins to Ferris State & that was only one of the best parts! The house itself was so clean and cozy and had everything you could ask for and MORE. The basement was so fun with ping pong, pool, shuffleboard, a putting green and so many other games. I wish we enjoyed the hot tub and boats which were available to us, but the outdoor bar was our spot. Thank you Bob, Damien & Sabrina!!!!! We hope to be back soon.

Incredible house and property! Beautiful fall scenery. So much to do on-site you never feel the need to leave. Absolutely perfect for family and friends to get together for an entertaining weekend. We will be back!
Beautiful home, perfect spot! Had a great time with guy friends!

WOW!!!!!! This place is absolutely amazing.
My family (8 people) rented both the main house and coach house to celebrate a handful of birthdays together for the first time in almost 15 years. It couldn't have been any more perfect and was everything we were hoping for and more.
The house is tucked away on a huge property with beautiful views, lakes, (yes you can swim!) and tons of room to have fun. Our family took advantage of everything available! Gameroom downstairs was SO MUCH fun, hot tub was nice and hot, canoe/boat/paddle board on the lake were provided, and the kitchen was stocked with everything needed.
We took advantage of the private chef dinner (Caitlin is wonderful!) and the food was delicious. We had leftovers that we used for breakfast and lunch - well worth the $$$!!
Check in and out was incredibly smooth and easy, Bob/property caretakers were helpful and very easy to reach. It couldn't have been a better 3 days. We are so grateful for this wonderful place and the memories that were created here together. Thank you so much.

I cannot say enough about the Grass Lake Lodge. The owner (Bob) and the caretakers (Sabrina and Damien) were all very informative as well as all around caring for their guests. They ensured everything was in order exactly as needed and continuously verified everything. Everything from location, seclusion, activities, cleanliness, and top notch appliances…. No detail is overlooked here. If you want an amazing getaway with all modern amenities, and a true sense of sportsman luxury, this is a perfectly beautiful place. Thank you Rob and family for sharing your amazing lake home to us! Ps.- The fishing is great too! Pss. - There are a lot of extras that can be directly booked through them as well. We did the private chef evening and it was completely amazing. The food was wonderful and so was chef Caitlin. Highly recommend it!

This was a wonderful experience; we felt so special to have enjoyed the beauty, comfort, activities, and family memories that come from being somewhere special. I feel so fortunate to have found this gem to celebrate my doctoral graduation from Ferris State University. While being with family, winning an award, and obtaining a terminal degree should have been enough - Grass Lake Lodge was a family blessing for all!
The owners have thought of everything! Excellent customer service, impeccable decor, gorgeous lodge placement with serene and beautiful views from every window.
There were so many thoughtful details - the groceries were picked up and put away before we arrived, allowing us to enjoy time with each other immediately. I spoiled the family with the private chef experience for brunch and dinner and it was incredible! Service, presentation, preparation (easy in a beautiful and large gourmet kitchen), and truly the most delicious 5 star food experience. Fine dinning in a what we loving called the “cabin/mansion” allowed us to enjoy each other’s company and feel taken care of.
We left feeling relaxed, pampered, and delighted that we created memories that we will all cherish forever. What a surprise Michigan and Grass Lake Lodge are for a family from the DMV.

Expectations exceded! Our group of ten ranging in age from 21-81 had a delightful 3 night stay at the Grass Lake Lodge for an early Mother's Day celebration. We had excellent communication with the owners and caretakers prior to, during and after our stay. The weather did not allow for much lake time but the GLL offers many other actitities. We especially enjoyed the extensive trail system and hot tub. We are looking forward to future stays at the GLL and hope to partake in GLL extras. A+
We had a terrific time. The property was beautiful and the house perfect for us.

This place is wonderful! Whether it is relaxing, playing in the game room, fishing, or hiking, there is plenty of space for everyone to enjoy. The house comes with all the cooking and cleaning products you may need, as well as extra bedding. Although we didn't bring any animals, they are welcome and we did not encounter any issues from previous renters. There are also extras that can be rented, such as the accompanying garage/house, a trolling motor, or massages!
If you are coming for the outdoor getaway, I do recommend warmer weather, however. Our stay was in early April, and fishing on the lake was a bit brutal with light snow falling. The lodge comfortably slept ten of us and we all had plenty to keep us occupied and entertained.
Communication from Robert was excellent and he was very quick on replies. The caretakers of the lodge were also very accessible and gave us complete space and freedom while we were there. I would recommend this lodge to anyone who wants a peaceful getaway!
Beautiful home and location!

My business partners and I spent some time planning at the Grass Lake Lodge — perfect space for our meeting. It was a beautiful setting, the house was gorgeous, the host and caretakers were helpful, and there were lots of fun things to do aside from work.
I’d highly recommend this place; it’s even better than the pictures.

Great newly renovated house with a short walk to the Muskegon river. The river was walkable big sand bars and deep holes to fish. The shared beach would be a great place to launch kayaks or for a relaxing day tubing. The home was an overall comfortable stay with most of what you’d need for a relaxing weekend stay. Would be helpful if there was a welcome/instruction book of things to do around the area and what to do before checking out.

I cannot express how incredibly beautiful this property and home are. It was the perfect get away into the country life. We enjoyed cooking meals outside together and going for walks to enjoy the views and farm life. The love and care put in to the home, make the experience all the more worthwhile. The farm provided relaxation in our busy lives and we couldn't have asked for a better place to do it. Thank you Rose and family for a truly unforgettable experience.
The house was great and Julie was very helpful.

Julie’s place was nothing short of spectacular! Beds were very comfortable and their were plenty of them for me and a few friends. Very clean and had all the amenities we needed. Hope to come back next year when we are in town again!

We enjoyed this scenic property. Beautiful rustic space, great view of stars amd we saw many deers walk through front yard. Great place for family to gather and visit with our Ferris State student. You wouldn't guess from country view, but its really close to campus.
Large and comfortable home on a wooded lot. Great place for family visiting Ferris State University.
Julie was really helpful! She was flexible with allowing our group to drop off some of our belongings before check in, as we were in town early. Perfect spot and great for a getaway weekend.

The large yard was nice for playing badminton, and the interior had plenty of space for our large group to gather. There were some things that weren't great, however: the smell of moth balls was OVERPOWERING. And, we had two seniors in our group that can't do stairs with ease, but the steps to get onto the porch or onto the deck were still a challenge for them. It would help if the home were more senior citizen accessible. There were a few broken chairs, but we still had plenty for the family to gather. Overall, we had a WONDERFUL time. We opened up the windows to get fresh air in, to try to minimize the mothball smell, and we would recommend the place to others.

Place was great. Looked just like the photos and there was plenty of rooms and beds for everyone. Everything worked as expected and the instructions/check in/check out were very straightforward and made the stay easier.
Great place to stay! Clean and exactly as presented.

The house had what our group needed. We wanted to be close to the Muskegon River for a tubing trip and we needed space for 12 to sleep. This place fit the bill. The space in the garage was nice too so that we could air out our tubes and clean them up to go home.
We really enjoyed our stay together with our family
Great quiet place to share a visit with a group of people for a weekend. Host was very responsive with messages.
We stayed for the weekend with 8 guys and played golf around the area. Property worked great for us. Julie made our stay easy, would stay here again
Great location, great price, great house!
Absolutely loved coming back here. The house is in such a fantastic spot and is very welcome. Julie is a great host! Would 100% come back here again.

Had a wonderful family weekend at Julie's house. It is very spacious and did very well for our family. The location was great! We were close to campus yet secluded and able to enjoy some peace and quiet. We would love to stay here again on future trips to Ferris.

We rented this house for family weekend at Ferris. The location was great for us. The house is essentially in the woods, and with the fall colors, the views were beautiful. We even saw a deer on the property. The house was pet friendly, so we were able to bring the furkids too. Tons of room, very clean. Will definitely rent again.
Check in was easy, the house is spacious and was great for accommodating our large family! It was a wonderful weekend.

This is the perfect getaway for a large group of people. Plenty of space inside and outside! The homes are not close by so you don't hear any neighbor noise and you have a long driveway that fits plenty of cars and a basketball hoop for everyone to enjoy.
The house is stocked pretty well. This is not an updated house but it's clean and kept well. The town is close and has plenty of cute small restaurants and stores or you can go a 10 minute drive and find the large stores where you will find anything you need.
Great place.

The house was very good for our golf group of 8 guys. The kitchen had everything we needed for doing steak and potatoes one night. It is difficult to find lodging options for a group of this size where everyone gets their own bed, so we were happy to find this house, and from what I heard, most of the beds were pretty comfortable (one guy said that his bed in the room with 3 beds was a little saggy in the middle). The upstairs bathroom is shared between 3 bedrooms with 7 beds, which is a little less than ideal, but with 2 full baths and a half bath, there wasn't too much of a traffic jam for showers, which were definitely needed after the hot, humid days of our trip.
There is a pretty private wooded back yard area with patio furniture and a fire pit and a gas grill. The grill is a bit old and has some cool spots, which made it challenging to cook 8 steaks, but we got it done. The patio dining furniture is a bit beat up, but functional. There are several adirondack chairs in the back area, too, which are basically all broken in one fashion or another--this is something that I would recommend that the owners remove/replace/repair, because they seem like an injury hazard, especially for kids.
The location was pretty good -- it's a quiet area without a lot of close neighbors. We didn't go into town, but it is very close to Big Rapids/Ferris State if you're looking to go there. It was about 25 minutes away from the golf courses at Tullymore/St. Ives and Canadian Lakes, where we played.
Communication with Julie was great -- fortunately, we had not issues with check-in or payment, so it was all a very smooth process from booking to checkout.
Overall, I would recommend this house to large groups, but a few minor things keep me from giving it a 5-star rating.
Fantastic for large gatherings! Private, yet minutes from downtown and access to the river.
The house was good for a golf weekend with close proximity to area courses. The bedrooms were spacious and the kitchen and living room were large enough for our group.

Perfect location! Minutes away from all the fun bars and shops! Nice quiet area, beautiful trees and wildlife! House is beautiful and large and can easily handle a large family gathering. Host was very responsive and pleasant! Great experience!

House was nice to stay in. Lots of room. House did seem to need to be restocked. Could not find indoor garbage bags anywhere. There wasn’t a can opener. Could use more dishes especially when you have larger groups staying in home.
Nice and clean house, convenient location, our group very enjoyed our stay
Worked out great for our buddies trip!

Comfortable beds and cozy living room. We loved the quiet setting with lots of birds singing and deer in the front lawn.
Wonderful home…spacious and exactly as described. If your looking for a place for big group this is the place.
The house was okay. It was nice that the house was very close to Ferris State University. Overall, I give this AirBnB a 3 out of 5 stars.
Stayed here a couple of other times and it never disappoints! Beautiful house and great location!
Wonderful place. Great for larger family.
Served our purpose for a family gathering after a Ferris State University Basketball game. Lots of places to sleep and great game playing area.

The use of the garage was a huge bonus; there are large front and back decks for a crowd.
We would definitely stay here again.

Our family had a great weekend stay. The house was perfect to accommodate all 10 adults. We were pleased with all the extras provided & available for our use. I appreciated how quickly our messages were answered. We definitely would stay again.

This home was the absolute perfect place for our weekend trip of travel to Michigan. The host had everything we needed and the house was cozy, spacious, clean and well stocked! Great place! Great location, close to Ferris State campus. Hoping to stay again!

This home is in a nice setting. It was very clean and had ample room for our group of 9 plus a baby. We would definitely stay here again.

Great place to have a little gathering! We had a great time. It was perfect for the group of people we had because everyone was able to get their own bed! Place was also very clean and everything that we needed was provided. Thank you!

Very clean.

Cheap, fun layout, pretty solid conditions for the price. I would 100% recommend this place if you are in the area and have a big group.
Great value
Beautiful house setting was perfect for the family gathering we had. Great memories created!

This was a great place for a large group to stay. We had 13 guys together for the weekend and were very comfortable with a few extra blow up mattresses.

We enjoyed our stay. House was clean and the location relative to Big Rapids was great.
Nice place!
Good spot 5 minutes from the downtown area, basketball hoop was a plus!

A great home with plenty of space for a larger group. Was perfect for my group of 9.
Highly recommend!
Great place to stay!

Fantastic stay with the a great location. Minutes from big rapids and minutes from a hand full of fantastic golf courses. Highly recommend host with great communication. Don't hesitate to book!

This place was great for my group of friends to get together and spend the weekend after such a long time in quarantine. It felt like we were far from the business of the city but we still had everything so close by. I only wish we could have stayed longer!
Very nice house. Our family enjoyed it very much. It had everything we needed.
This place made for a great weekend getaway! Everyone had such a good time and no complaints from anyone. Very nice area, not too close to neighbors. Highly recommended!
Was a lovely place to stay. Would recommend to anyone.
It was nice and quiet no neighbors to close.

Great and quiet location very close to everything Big Rapids has to offer. Everyone loved our stay here. We didn’t feel like we were on top of each other even with 6 of us. Clean home and very responsive hosts. We’ve s already talked about coming back in the summer.

Great choice for multiple families to come together. The beds were comfortable, plenty of blankets. If you use more than one towel for your shower, bing some. We used it for a ski weekend and it was perfect.
It was a nice house over all
Very nice and beautiful stay for family and friends. House was clean with all required amenities. Host was very quick in all response. I would recommend for must stay place in Michigan.
Loved the location - had a great morning watching a deer enjoy the front yard!
Nice for a large group. Very comfortable beds.

The house is amazingly nice and clean. The living room is spacious and cozy; our three families fit in the kitchen table perfectly fine; the beds are soft and comfortable - we know they are new sheets because there were a few new ones in the closet. This house is even better in person than in the photos! It is spacious, clean, and secluded. The surrounding woods are beautiful. We loved playing yard games and sitting around the fire! We will definitely be back.
Great place to stay! Super homey and clean!

Great place to stay with family or friends. Quiet and peaceful place.

Was a great a place to stay!! Super clean and spacious! Would recommend to anyone!
Loved the house super great location! Had fun thanks for having us.
The house was clean and surrounded by a private beautiful yard. Great spot for a larger family/friend get together.

Julie's place is wonderful. It has lots of space and a beautiful property setting. It can easily accommodate 2 families. It is very close to Big Rapids and the university. The next time we are in that area, we will definitely try to stay at Julie's house again!!
Nicest Airbnb I have stayed at. Super clean, we all felt like it was our home. Looking forward to going back
Lots of space and clean
This is a treasure in Big Rapids! A nice location, only a few minutes drive from downtown. Very beautiful and clean space. Would definitely stay again!

This place was wonderful! Close to town but far enough out to be peaceful and feel secluded.
The back and front porch were awesome to watch the deer, squirrels and chipmunks play.
We had 8 adults and had so much room. The bedrooms were large, double sink bathrooms, plenty of hot water, and great kitchen layout. Very clean too.

We had a labor day weekend at Julie's place! The house is in a very quiet neighborhood, surrounded by trees and animals, perfect for a get-away from our busy life! The inside is super clean! When we had a problem with the gas tank for the grill, she responded quickly and solved our problem. She's a great host!
Great place for a large group. Plenty of room and Julie was grat to work with.
This house was great for our party of 15!! Very spacious and beds for everyone! I'd recommend this house to anyone! 10/10 from me!
Great house and great communication by the owner! Would rent there again!

Terrific place sfor a family weekend. Super clean, modern decorating, comfy beds, close to a park on the river, large driveway, spacious back patio, yard games included and more.
The only negative thing was the A/C stopped working upstairs during our stay in July and it got up to 80F in the bedrooms. So, you’re good to go!

Julie's property was perfect for our golf trip in the Big Rapids area. The only downside we found was that the AC unit was having trouble keeping up with the hot weather, but it wasn't too bad. I would definitely recommend checking this place out if you're staying in the area.

Julie’s place was perfect for our cozy weekend we were looking for. She had everything you could possibly need within the home which was beyond appreciated. The fire pit at night was awesome. We saw deer 2/3 mornings. Very peaceful place to stay.

House great, location great, very quiet. Enjoyed watching deer walk down the road and around the area.
Absolutely beautiful house, in a recluse location but not too far from any place or adventure! Close to parks and the muskegon river, great for large groups or family outings!!
The house was perfect for our needs. Julie was easy to communicate with and made sure we didn’t need anything. We will be back.

Susan was an excellent host! She was so kind and was constantly asking if I needed anything to make my visit more comfortable. I would highly recommend Susan to anyone thinking of visiting Big Rapids.
Susan was such an amazing host, very communicative and caring.
Susan was a delighful and accomodating host. I would highly recommend Susan and her dog Pearl. An overall wonderful experience
Comfortable bed and private room. Shower is ok and the floor creaks a lot. It's perfectly fine for staying a night or two
Susan is a very good host. She is extremely helpful and attentive to her guests.

Susan is a wonderful host. We stayed at her place for more than 10 days. Everything is very good. Shared areas such as living room, dining room are very spacious. There is a large garden in the back. The area is very quiet and airy. Very convenient to go to FSU as well as downtown Big Rapids. Susan was very friendly and helpful. She helped us a lot. I strongly recommend her to everyone. I will definitely stay at Susan's place on my future visits to Big Rapids
I enjoyed staying at Susan’s. Just be aware that if you’re sensitive to strong smell this might not be the place for you.
Stay was nice! Close to eating places. Susan was there if you needed anything!

Things important to me are enough room in the fridge, comfortable firm bed, nice shower. All those boxes checked and the best back yard with patio to enjoy meals while observing nature. Susan is a very nice person with a big heart. She is perfect to host a Airbnb because her profession is taking care of elderly and others w/physical challenges. Very nice lady and a fantastic dog. Great host.

This home was perfect! It was spacious and clean. The rec area downstairs was nice to have, and the deck in back is private and relaxing. Home was easy to find and had lots of amenities. Our host was super friendly and responsive.
Nice home in a nice neighborhood. Felt comfortable in the space and area. Worked well for my college son and me.

It was a great place to stay for the weekend while we were visiting family. The workout area in the basement was an added bonus! It is close to Big Rapids if you are looking for bigger stores and restaurant franchises, but also had a great selection of family owned restaurants around the area to choose from! We had subs from Fatbelly Deli & Creamy and they were amazing! Thank you for the great stay Arturo!
Arturo was a great host and was quick to respond with requests. He was very flexible for our stay. The home was very comfortable for me and my family.

This is the second time we’ve stayed here and it was just as great the second time as it was the first time And we will definitely want to stay again sometime
A great place to spend a trip at, great location and amenities.

This place is truly “Home Away from Home”

In addition to the usual kitchen amenities, the unit has a Ninja Bullet , Air Fryer, and 2 coffee machines.
The automatic lighted entryway for entrance after dark, bidets in both bathrooms, defog mirrors, heated floor tiles, and a spa bath really add extra and make the “Home Away” title true!
The house is located in a very pleasant suburban alcove which is great for walks during the day. The town of Big Rapids is about 5 miles away, with a convenience store about 1 mile away for a quick trip.
The host is quick to respond to any questions and I wouldn’t hesitate to stay here again.
Everything was perfect. The place was super spacious and enough room for the three of us. Would definitely book again.

perfect place to stay.

Perfect for a weekend at Ferris to visit our student. Close to campus, roomy, quiet and so much better than a hotel for 4 adults!

Arturo was kind enough to let us check out late as our power didn’t come back on until late afternoon. We hope to come back to visit family for the holidays.

We had a great time. The house was very complete. It had everything. The only thing was that the beds are kind of small. My wife and I are used to sleeping in a KING bed, and we had to sleep in a very small bed.
Very enjoyable! Truly a home away from home.

Very convenient to Ferris. Nice, quiet location. Wooded backyard with full deck and comfortable outdoor seating. Ample parking. Wish we had gone downstairs before our last day (we thought it was just a regular basement), but it had a full workout setup, pool table, and projector/screen.
Great location especially for graduation and ceremonies close to Ferris. so much room and great deck and basement. Very comfortable and a great kitchen..
Great location very roomy and up-to-date home with all of the amenities the host is very easy to work with and communicates very well

great place!

A Great host and team who are very communicative and accommodating. This is a very relaxed atmosphere with a comfortable feeling, and a beautiful setting near nature. Thanks Robert.
what an amazing experience we absolutely had a ball .Thank you for making us to home

Very nice place to stay. It's very, very clean, quiet, and spacious. We checked in late, and only stayed one night, so we didn't use the outside area or the TV/LR area. The inside is immaculately clean, and very large! The kitchen/breakfast bar area is perfect for grabbing a quick bite to eat or packing sandwiches for the day. One of the bedrooms had water from a recent hard rain, so we slept in the rear bedroom. It could have been an issue if we were traveling with others, but we were alone. One issue I had was that the upstairs and downstairs are not divided by any wall, or door. Only a long curtain running the length of an open, sideways staircase. It didn't feel isolated to me, and I was a little upset that it wasn't mentioned in the write up. Also, the back door doesn't lock from the outside, only from the inside. You don't get a key, and you must leave the door unlocked when you go out. I've only been in a few Air B&B's so I'm not sure if that is common? It's quiet, and semi secluded. The backyard is wooded, but there's a fairly busy country road nearby. We saw cars driving by, and people walking from the back patio. The pond area looks nice, but we only made a quick walk around before we left. The walk from the parking area to the back door is a good distance. The steppingstones down to the back yard are a little difficult to see at first. We walked around the wrong side of the house by mistake because we didn’t see the path (my bad). Also, the path is also kind of steep and was slick when the grass was wet. It could be an issue for older, or mobility challenged folks. Overall, it is a VERY nice rural home. The amenities are well stocked, we had everything we could possibly need. The furniture is quality wood, sturdy and well made. If you like the cabin or woodsy décor motif, you will love this place! We were traveling alone, but there is plenty of room for a larger group. There’s not much around Reed City, a few restaurants, and a nice little brewery in town. Out by the highway, there’s a gas station and some fast food options. It’s peaceful and quiet, and if you don’t mind the curtain being the only divider between up and down stairs, it is very comfortable. We only met Brian. He was very nice and gave good recommendations for food and travel in the area. I only saw Tracie in passing as she was leaving for work, we spoke briefly, but she seemed very nice. Thanks for hosting us!
